Mpela ila masindi igakuti pakusonganganywa ni kutinisya, iyoyo ichichiŵa kumbesi kwa chilambo chino.
Mwana jwa Mundu chachalajisya achikatumetume ŵao ŵa kwinani kuti asonganganye kutyochela mu Umwenye wao wose aŵala ŵakwaleŵekasya ŵandu atende sambi ni wose ŵatesile ya sambi.
Ni achikatumetume ŵa kwinani wo chiŵaponye ŵandu pa litanuli lya mooto wakalipa ni kweleko chalile ni kuchilimya meeno.
Kele katema ko ŵandu ŵakupanganya yaili yambone paujo pa Akunnungu chachimelemenda mpela lyuŵa mu Umwenye wa Atati ŵao. Ŵakwete mapikanilo, apikanile!
“Umwenye wa kwinani ulandene ni mbiko jajisisiche mu ngunda. Mundu jumpepe ŵajiweni ni kujisisa sooni. Nipele ŵasangalele nnope ni ŵajawile kukuisumisya iŵakwete yose ni kusuma ngunda ula.
“Sooni, umwenye wa kwinani ulandene ni mundu jwakusumisya malonda achisosaga igogo yambone.
Nombe paŵachiweni chigogo chimo cha ndalama jajikulungwa, ŵajawile, ŵaisumisye iŵakwete yose, ŵachisumile chigogo chila.
“Sooni, Umwenye wa kwinani ulandene ni lwau lwauponyekwe mu litanda, lwatanjile somba syasili syose.
Lwau palwagumbele, ŵakukoka somba ŵaluutile kumbwani, ŵatemi kusagula somba syambone ni kusitaga mu itundu yao ni somba syangalumbana ŵasijasile.
Yeleyi ni ichichiŵa kumbesi kwa chilambo chino, achikatumetume ŵa kwinani chachikopochela, chiŵalekanganye ŵandu ŵambone ni ŵangalumbana.
Nombe ŵele ŵangalumbana wo chiŵajasile pa litanuli lya mooto. Kweleko chachilila ni kuchilimya meeno.”
Che Yesu ŵausisye, “Ana gele gose ga nkugamanyilila?” Ŵajanjile, “Elo.”
Nombewo ŵaasalile, “Kwa ligongo lyo, jwakwiganya Malajisyo ga Akunnungu gaŵapele che Musa jwalijose jwakuŵa jwakulijiganya jwa Umwenye wa kwinani, alandene ni nsyene nyuumba jwakukoposya mu mbiko jakwe indu ya ndalama ya sambano ni indu ya ndalama ya kalakala.”
Che Yesu paŵamasile kuŵecheta yele itagu yo, ŵatyosile pelepo,
ni ŵapite mu musi wao. Kweleko ŵajiganyaga ŵandu mu nyuumba jao ja kupopelela, nombewo ŵasimosile nikuti, “Jweleju apatile kwapi alu lunda lu ni ukombole wa kuipanganya yakusimonjeka?
Ana ajuju ngati mwana jwa jwakusepa itela? Achikulu ŵao ngati akuŵilanjikwa che Maliamu ni achapwakwe ngati che Yakobo ni che Yusufu ni che Simoni ni che Yuda?
Achalumbugwe wose ngati ali pamo ni uweji? Nambi ajuju apatile kwapi aga gose ga?”
Nipele, nganiŵakunda. Nambo Che Yesu ŵaasalile, “Jwakulondola jwa Akunnungu akuchimbichikwa nambo ngaakuchimbichikwa mu chilambo chakwe ni mu nyuumba jakwe!”
Kwa ligongo lyo, nganatenda yakusimonjeka yaijinji ligongo lya ungali chikulupi wao.
Kele katema ko chilongola che Helode ŵapilikene ngani si Che Yesu.
Nipele, ŵaasalile achikatumetume ŵao, “Jwele mundu ni che Yohana Ŵakubatisya asyuchile mchiwa, lyele ni ligongo machili gakupanganya yakusimonjeka gakupanganya masengo nkati mwakwe.”
Che Helode ni juŵankamwile che Yohana ni kuntaŵa kwa minyolo, ŵammisile mu nyuumba jakutaŵilwa kwa ligongo lya che Helodia, ŵankwawo che Filipo nkulugwe.
Ligongo che Yohana ŵansalile che Helode kuti, “Ngankusachilwa kunnombela jwele jwankongwe jo!”
Che Helode ŵasachile kwaulaga che Yohana, nambo ŵajogwepe ŵandu pakuŵa kukwao che Yohana ŵaliji jwakulondola jwa Akunnungu.
Nipele, pa chindimba cha lyuŵa lyekulungwa lya kupagwa kwao che Helode, mwali jwao che Helodia ŵatyasile mmbujo mwa achalendo ni mwali jula ŵaasengwasisye che Helode,
mpaka ŵalanjile achitiji, “Ngulumbilila, chinampe chachili chose chachinsache.”
Nombejo ŵanyenjekwe ni achikulugwe, ŵatite, “Mumbeje panopano ntwe u che Yohana Ŵakubatisya mumbale.”
Mwenye ŵasupwiche, nambo kwa ligongo lya kulumbila kwao ni ligongo lya achalendo ŵaŵatemi pamo nawo, ŵalajisye apegwe.
Nipele, che Helode ŵannajisye mundu ku nyuumba ja kutaŵila ŵandu kuti ŵakate che Yohana ntwe.
Ntwe wakwe wajigalikwe mu mbale ni kumpa mwali, nombejo ŵampele achikulugwe.
Ŵakulijiganya ŵa che Yohana ŵaiche, ŵachijigele chiilu chakwe, ŵachisichile. Nipele ŵajawile kukwasalila Che Yesu.
Che Yesu paŵapilikene ngani syo, ŵatyosile pepala kwa ngalaŵa, ŵajawile pantemela pajikape. Nambo ŵandu paŵapilikene, ŵakuiye kwa makongolo achityochelaga mmisi jao.
Nipele, paŵaiche kumbwani, ŵauweni mpingo wekulungwa wa ŵandu, ŵakolele chanasa ni ŵalamisye ŵakulwala ŵao.
Pakwaswele, ŵakulijiganya ŵao ŵaichilile ni kwasalila, “Apano patuli pa mwikonde ni sambano kuswele. Sambano, mwalanje ŵandu wo kuti ajaule mmisinda akalisumile chakulya.”
Che Yesu ŵaasalile, “Nganakola ligongo lya kwaula, ŵanyamwe mwape chakulya.”
Nambo ŵanyawo ŵanjanjile, “Tukwete mikate nsano pe ni somba siŵili.”
Che Yesu ŵaasalile, “Njise nawo apano.”
Ŵaasalile ŵandu kuti atame paasi pa manyasi. Nipele, Che Yesu ŵajigele mikate nsano ni somba sila, ŵalolite kwinani, ŵatogolele Akunnungu ni kugaŵanya ni kwapa ŵakulijiganya mikate jo, nombewo ŵagaŵenye ŵandu.
Ŵalile wose, ŵajikwite. Nipele ŵakulijiganya ŵalokwete sigasi sya mikate jila, ŵagumbesye itundu kumi na mbili.
Wose ŵaŵalile ŵala ŵaliji achalume mpela elufu tano, pangaŵalanjikwa achimmasyeto ni ŵanache.
Pangakaŵa, Che Yesu ŵaasalile ŵakulijiganya ŵao akwele mu ngalaŵa kuti alongolele peesi litanda asyene aninkujilanga mipingo ja ŵandu.
Paŵamasile kwalanga ŵandu, ŵakwesile kwitumbi ali jikape kukupopela. Pakwaswele, ŵelewo ŵaliji kweleko jikape.
Kele katema ko ngalaŵa jo jaŵandichile pambindikati litanda, nambo jaliji nkupungunyikwa kwannope ni matumbela pakuŵa mbungo jaliji nkujiputa.
Kumasikusiku, Che Yesu ŵaichile ŵakulijiganya ŵao achendaga mmeesi.
Ŵakulijiganya ŵao paŵaweni achendaga mmeesi, ŵajogwepe nnope ni ŵatite, “Lili lilaika!” Ŵagumilangaga kwa woga.
Papopo, Che Yesu ŵasalile, “Muusimane ntima, ndili une, nkajogopa!”
Che Petulo ŵatite, “Ambuje mwaŵaga mmwe, muusalile iche kukwenu njendaga mmeesi.”
Che Yesu ŵatite, “Njise.” Nipele che Petulo ŵatulwiche mu ngalaŵa, ŵajesile mmeesi, kwajaulila Che Yesu.
Nambo paŵajiweni mbungo, ŵajogwepe ni ŵatandite kutiŵila, ŵagumisile achitiji, “Ambuje mungulupusye!”
Papopo Che Yesu ŵagolwesye nkono wao, ŵankamwile ni ŵansalile, “Mmwe ŵa chikulupi chachinandi, ligongo chi nkukola lipamba?”
Nipele, wose ŵakwesile mu ngalaŵa, ni mbungo jatulele.
Nombe, wose ŵaŵaliji mu ngalaŵa ŵatindiŵalile ni kwakotamila, achitiji, “Isyene alakwe ndi Mwana jwa Akunnungu.”
Ŵajombweche litanda ni ŵaiche ku msinda wa ku Genesaleti.
Ŵandu ŵa pepala paŵaamanyi Che Yesu, ŵajenesye ngani muumbali mose mumwasyungwile. Nipele, ŵannyichisye ŵakulwala wose,
ni ŵachondelele kuti akwaye atamuno lujenje lya mwinjilo ŵao. Nombe wose ŵaŵankwaiye ŵalamile.
Nipele, Mafalisayo ni ŵakwiganya Malajisyo ŵaichile Che Yesu kutyochela ku Yelusalemu.
Paŵaiche ŵambusisye, “Kwachichi ŵakulijiganya wenu akugapwanya majiganyo gatupochele kutyochela kwa achambuje ŵetu? Ngakunaŵa makono yambone akanaŵe kutanda kulya?”
Che Yesu ŵajanjile, “Kwachichi ŵanyamwe mkupwanya makanyo ga Akunnungu kwa kusechelela majiganyo genu mwachinsyene?
Akunnungu atite, ‘Mwachimbichisye atati ŵenu ni achikulu ŵenu,’ ni ‘Jwakunlwesya atatigwe atamuno achikulugwe, akusachilwa kuulajikwa.’
Nambo ŵanyamwe nkwiganya kuti, mundu aŵaga ni chindu cha kwakamuchisya atatigwe atamuno achikulugwe, ni atiji, ‘Achi chindu chi ndyosisye sadaka kwa Akunnungu.’
Nipele, jwele mundu jo ngakwachimbichisya atatigwe! Yele ni inkuti pakulinyelusya lilamulo lya Akunnungu ni kugakuya majiganyo genu mwachinsyene.
Ŵanyamwe ŵaulamba! Che Isaya jwakulondola jwa Akunnungu ŵasagamukwile yambone yankati ŵanyamwe paŵatite,
‘Akunnungu akuti, aŵa ŵandu ŵa akunjimbichisyanga ni ngomo pe, nambo mmitima jao atalikengene ni une.
Nombe akumbopela iyiyipe, pakuŵa indu yakwiganya ili malajisyo ga ŵandu pe.’ ”
Nipele, Che Yesu ŵauŵilasile mpingo wa ŵandu, ŵaasalile, “Mpilikane ni kumanyilila!
Chindu chachikuntaga mundu usakwa ngaŵa chachikwinjila nkang'wa, nambo achila chachikutyoka nkang'wa ni chachikuntaga mundu usakwa.”
Nipele ŵakulijiganya ŵao ŵajaulile ni kwasalila, “Ana nkumanyilila kuti Mafalisayo yachimile paŵapilikene maloŵe genu?”
Nambo ŵelewo ŵatite, “Mmela wauliwose wanganapande Atati ŵangu ŵa kwinani, chiuchitupulwa.
Mwaleche ŵanyawo! Ŵele ali ŵangalola ŵakwalongosya ŵangalola. Jwangalola annongosyaga jwangalola njakwe, wose ŵaŵili chatumbuchile mwisimbo.”
Che Petulo ŵatite, “Ntugopolele chele chitagu cho.”
Che Yesu ŵaasalile, “Nombe ŵanyamwe ŵakwe ngankumanyilila?
Ana ngankumanyilila kuti chindu chachikwinjila nkang'wa chikupita nnutumbo ni chikujasikwa kulindi?
Nambo yaikutyoka nkang'wa ikutyochela mu ntima, yele ni yaikuntaga mundu usakwa.
Pakuŵa mu ntima sikukopoka ng'anisyo syangalumbana sya kuulaga ni chikululu ni chigwagwa ni wiyi ni kuŵecheta yaunami ni kutukana.
Gelego ni gakuntaga mundu usakwa. Nambo kulya panganaŵa makono ngakukuntaga mundu usakwa.”
Che Yesu ŵatyosile kweleko ni ŵajile ku chilambo cha ku Tilo ni ku Sidoni.
Nipele, jwankongwe jumo Mkanaani, kutyochela chilambo chilachila, ŵaichilile achinyanyisyaga, “Ambuje, Mwana ju che Daudi, mungolele chanasa! Mwali jwangu akamwilwe ni masoka kwannope.”
Nambo Che Yesu ngananjanga liloŵe. Ŵakulijiganya ŵao ŵajaulile ni kwachondelela achitiji, “Mwasalile ajaule, pakuŵa akutukuya ali nkunyokonya.”
Che Yesu ŵajanjile, “Akunnungu andumile kukwakulupusya ŵandu ŵa ku Isilaeli ŵaŵapotele mpela ngondolo.”
Pelepo jwambumba jula ŵaiche ni kwatindiŵalila paujo pao achitiji, “Ambuje, mungamuchisye.”
Che Yesu ŵajanjile, “Ngaŵa yambone kutola chakulya cha ŵanache ni kusiponyela mbwa.”
Jwankongwe jo ŵajanjile, “Elo, Ambuje, nambo mbwa sikulya mbakatika sisikupatuka pakulila achambuje ŵao.”
Pelepo Che Yesu ŵajanjile, “Jwankongwe, chikulupi chenu chachikulungwa, nipele, chitendekwe kukwenu chinkusaka.” Mwali jwao jula ni ŵalamile katema kakoko.
Che Yesu ŵatyosile pelepo ni kwaula mungulugulu litanda lya Galilaya, ŵakwesile kwitumbi, ŵatemi paasi.
Nipele, jaichile mipingo ja ŵandu ŵajinji, ŵampelechele ŵandu ŵangajenda ni ŵangalola ni ŵakulemala ni ŵangaŵecheta ni ŵane ŵajinji ŵakulwala, nipele ŵaŵisile mmbujo mwakwe ni kwalamya.
Nombe mpingo wa ŵandu ula wasimonjile nnope paŵaweni ŵangaŵecheta aninkuŵecheta ni ŵangalola aninkulola ni ŵakulemala ali alamile ni ŵangajenda aninkwenda, ŵandu ŵaakusisye Akunnungu ŵa ku Isilaeli.
Che Yesu ŵaaŵilasile ŵakulijiganya ŵao, ŵaasalile, “Ngwakolela chanasa aŵa ŵandu ŵa pakuŵa atemi ni une moŵa gatatu sambano ni nganakola chakulya. Ngangusaka naaleche ajaule pangalya ngakaŵa chakomoche mwitala.”
Ŵakulijiganya ŵala ni ŵatite, “Tutupate kwapi chakulya chachijinji cha kwajikutisya ŵele ŵandu ŵa?”
Che Yesu ŵaausisye, “Nkwete mikate jilingwa?” Ŵajanjile, “Saba ni tusomba kanandi pe.”
Nipele Che Yesu ŵaasalile ŵandu atamanje paasi.
Ŵajitosile mikate saba ni tusomba tula, ŵatogolele Akunnungu, ŵajigaŵenye ni kwapa ŵakulijiganya ŵao, nombe ŵakulijiganya wo ŵagaŵenye ŵandu.
Ŵalile wose, ŵajikwite. Paŵamasile kulya ŵalokotenye mbakatika ja mikate ni somba sila itundu saba yegumbale.
Ŵele uŵalile wo ŵaliji achalume elufu nne, pangaŵalanjila achakongwe ni ŵanache.
Nipele, Che Yesu ŵalanjile ŵandu, ŵakwesile mu ngalaŵa ni kwaula ku chilambo cha Magadani.
Mafalisayo ni Masadukayo ŵaajaulile Che Yesu, ni kwa kwalinga ŵaŵendile ŵalosye chimanyisyo kutyochela kwinani.
Nambo Che Yesu ŵaasalile, “Lyaikaga ligulo ŵanyamwe nkutinji, ‘Lelo chikulanguche pakuŵa kwiunde kuchejele!’
Ni kuninkucha nkutinji, ‘Lelo mbungo chijipuje, pakuŵa kwiunde kuchejele sooni maunde gagumbele!’ Nipele, ŵanyamwe nkukombola kumanyilila upagwe wa liunde, nambo imanyisyo ya katema kano ngankukombola kuimanyilila.
Uŵelesi wangalumbana ni wangali ni chikulupi ukusosa chimanyisyo, nambo ngaupegwa chimanyisyo ikaŵe chimanyisyo chi che Yona.” Nipele ŵalesile ni kwaula.
Ŵakulijiganya ŵao paŵamasile koombochela mbande jine ja litanda, ŵaliji aliŵalile kwigala mikate.
Che Yesu ŵaasalile kuti, “Nlilolechesye ni nligose ni amila ja Mafalisayo ni Masadukayo!”
Nambo ŵele ŵanyawo ŵaliji nkuusyana achinsyene pe achitiji, “Akuŵecheta yeleyo pakuŵa nganitujigala mikate.”
Che Yesu ŵasimanyilile ng'anisyo syao ni kwasalila, “Ligongo chi nkuusyana mwachinsyene pe, ŵanyamwe ŵa chikulupi chachinandi kuti nganinjigala mikate?
Ana ngankumanyilila atamuno kukumbuchila panagaŵenye mikate tano jila, kwa ŵandu elufu tano ŵala? Ana itundu ilingwa ya mbakatika imwagumbesye?
Pane mikate saba jila jiŵagaŵenye ŵandu elufu nne, ana itundu ilingwa ya mbakatika imwalokotenye?
Uli, ngankumanyilila kuti nganingunguluchilaga mikate? Nambo nlilolechesye ni amila ja Mafalisayo ni Masadukayo!”
Pelepo ŵakulijiganya ŵaimanyilile kuti nganaŵecheta yankati amila ja mikate, nambo majiganyo ga Mafalisayo ni Masadukayo.
Che Yesu paŵaiche mmusi wa Kaisalia Filipi, ŵausisye ŵakulijiganya ŵao kuti, “Ŵandu akuti Mwana jwa Mundu ali nduni?”
Ŵajanjile, “Ŵane akuti che Yohana Ŵakubatisya ni ŵane akuti che Elia ni ŵane akuti che Yelemia, pane jumo jwao ŵakulondola ŵa Akunnungu.”
Che Yesu ŵaausisye sooni, “Nombe ŵanyamwe nkuti une ndili nduni?”
Che Simoni Petulo ŵajanjile, “Alakwe ni Kilisito Jwakuwombola, Mwana jwa Akunnungu ŵaali ŵajumi.”
Che Yesu ŵatite, “Nkwete upile mmwe che Simoni mwana ju che Yona, pakuŵa ngaŵa mundu jwammunukulile ngani jo, nambo Atati ŵangu ŵaali kwinani.
None ngunsalila, mmwe ni che Petulo ni pa lwele lwala lu chindandisye mpingo wa ŵandu ŵakunkulupilila Kilisito ni machili ga chiwa ngagaika kuukombola.
None chinampe iugulilo ya Umwenye wa kwinani, ni chachili chose chachinchitaŵe pa chilambo pano, chichiŵe chetaŵikwe kwinani ni chachili chose chachinchigopole pa chilambo pano, chichiŵe chegopolwe kwinani.”
Nipele ŵakanyisye kwa nnope ŵakulijiganya ŵao kuti akansalila mundu kuti ŵelewo ali Kilisito.
Chitandile ke katema ko Che Yesu ŵatandite kwalosya pangasisika ŵakulijiganya ŵao kuti yaŵajile kwaula ku Yelusalemu ni kweleko chalagaswe ni achachekulu ni ilongola ŵa achakulu ŵambopesi ni ŵakwiganya Malajisyo. Nipele chachiulagwa ni pa lyuŵa lyaatatu chasyuche.
Pelepo che Petulo ŵaajigele Che Yesu pambali ni ŵatandite kwakalipila achitiji, “Ngwamba Ambuje! Ngagansimana gelego!”
Nambo Che Yesu ŵagalauchile ni kwasalila che Petulo, “Ntyoche paujo pangu, Shetani! Mmwe nkusiŵila litala paujo pangu, pakuŵa ngankuganisya gagali ga Akunnungu, nambo ga ŵandu!”
Nipele, Che Yesu ŵaasalile ŵakulijiganya ŵao, “Mundu jwakusaka kunguya, alikane nsyene, atwichile nsalaba wakwe, anguye une.
Pakuŵa, mundu jwalijose jwakusaka kuukulupusya umi wakwe, chaujase. Nambo mundu jwakuutyosya umi wakwe kwaligongo lyangu, chaukole sooni.
Ana mundu chapate chichi akolaga chipanje cha pa chilambo, ali ajasile umi wakwe? Pane mundu chatyosye chichi pamalo pa umi wakwe?
Pakuŵa Mwana jwa Mundu chachiika mu ukulu wa Atatigwe pamo ni achikatumetume ŵakwe ŵa kwinani, pelepo chachinlipa jwalijose malinga ni masengo gao.
Ngunsalila isyene, apali ŵane mwa ŵanjimi apano ngaapasya chiwa akanaŵe kummona Mwana jwa Mundu achiikaga ali Mwenye.”
Pagamasile moŵa sita, Che Yesu ŵajigele che Petulo ni che Yakobo ni che Yohana mpwao, ŵakwesile pamo nawo penani chitumbi cheleu, kweleko ŵaliji ŵanyapewo.
Kweleko, Che Yesu ŵagalawiche uwoneche wakwe paujo pao, ku meeso kwao kwamelemendaga mpela lyuŵa ni iwalo yao yaliji yeswela mpela lulanga.
Chisisimuchile che Musa ni che Elia ŵaakopochele, ŵaliji nkukunguluka ni Che Yesu.
Pelepo che Petulo ŵaasalile Che Yesu, “Ambuje, yambone uwe kuŵa apano! Mwasakaga chindaŵe masakasa gatatu, limo lyenumwe ni line li che Musa ni line li che Elia.”
Paŵaŵechetaga gelego, liunde lyeswela lyaunichile ŵanyawo, ni lyapikaniche liloŵe kutyochela mu liunde lila lichitiji, “Aju ali Mwanangu jungunnonyela, nonyelwe nawo, mumpilikanichisye jwelejo.”
Ŵakulijiganya paŵapilikene yeleyo ŵajogwepe nnope, ŵagwile manguku.
Nipele Che Yesu ŵaichilile, ŵakwayiye achitiji, “Njimuche, nkajogopa!”
Paŵalolite kwinani nganammona mundu jwalijose akaŵe Che Yesu jika pe.
Nipele, paŵatulukaga pa chitumbi po, Che Yesu ŵaasalile, “Kasimunsalila mundu jwalijose inyiweni ila, mpaka patachisyuka Mwana jwa Mundu kutyochela mu chiwa.”
Nipele ŵakulijiganya ŵao ŵammusisye, “Kwachichi nambi ŵakwiganya Malajisyo ga Akunnungu gaŵapele che Musa akuti chaiche kaje che Elia?”
Che Yesu ŵajanjile, “Isyene, che Elia chaiche kaje ni kukolosya indu yose iŵe chile.
Nambo ngunsalila, che Elia amasile kwika, nganammanyilila, nambo ŵantendele iŵasachile. Nombewo chachinnagasya Mwana jwa Mundu iyoyopeyo.”
Pelepo ŵakulijiganya ŵala ŵaimanyilile kuti ŵangambaga che Yohana Ŵakubatisya.
Paŵaiche sooni pa wele mpingo wa ŵandu ula, ŵaiche mundu jumo mmbujo pa Che Yesu ni kwatindiŵalila,
ŵatite, “Ambuje, munkolele chanasa mwanangu pakuŵa akulwala njilinjili ni kulaga nnope, katema kakajinji akugwilila pa mooto pane mmeesi.
Nannyichisye kwa ŵakulijiganya ŵenu, nambo nganakombola kunnamya.”
Che Yesu ŵajanjile, “Uŵelesi wangali chikulupi ni wakulyungasika, ana chime ni ŵanyamwe mpaka chakachi? Mpaka chakachi chinampililile? Munjise nawo apano.”
Nipele, Che Yesu ŵalikalipile lisoka lila, nombelyo lyankopweche ni jwanchanda jula ŵalamile katema kakoko.
Nipele, ŵakulijiganya ŵaichile Che Yesu kwa chisyepela ni kwausya, “Ligongo chi nganitukombola kulikoposya lisoka lila?”
Che Yesu ŵajanjile, “Kwa ligongo lya chikulupi chenu chachinandi. Ngunsalila isyene, mwaŵaga ni chikulupi atamuno chaŵaga chachinandi chisau mbeju jajinandi nnope jajikuŵilanjikwa haladali, chinkombole kuchisalila achi chitumbi chi, ‘Ntyoche apa njaule ako,’ nombecho chichityoche. Ngalipagwa liloŵe lyangalikombolecheka kukwenu.”
Nambo lisoka lyanti yele ngalikutyosyekwa ikaŵe kwa kupopela ni kutaŵa.
Ŵakulijiganya paŵaliji pamo ku Galilaya, Che Yesu ŵaasalile, “Mwana jwa Mundu akwaula kukutagwa mmakono ga ŵandu.
Nombewo chachimmulaga, nambo chachisyuka pa lyuŵa lyaatatu.” Pelepo ŵakulijiganya ŵasongoneche nnope.
Che Yesu ni ŵakulijiganya ŵao paŵaiche ku Kapelenaumu ŵandu ŵakukumbikanya nsongo wa Nyuumba ja Akunnungu ŵaichilile che Petulo, ŵausisye, “Ana jwakwiganya jwenu akulipa nsongo wa Nyuumba ja Akunnungu?”
Che Petulo ŵajanjile, “Elo, akulipa.” Nipele, che Petulo paŵajinjile mu nyuumba, akanaŵe kuŵecheta liloŵe, Che Yesu ŵalongolele kummusya achitiji, “Che Simoni, mmwe nkuti uli? Mamwenye ŵa pa chilambo akukumbikanya nsongo atamuno ushulu kwa ŵandu chi? Kutyochela kwa achinsyene musi pane kwa achalendo?”
Che Petulo ŵajanjile, “Kutyochela kwa achalendo.” Che Yesu ŵansalile, “Nipele, iŵaga ili yeleyo, achinsyene musi wo ngakusachilwa kulipa.
Nambo tukaachima ŵandu ŵa. Njaule kulitanda nkaloposye, ni somba jandanda kutanjila pa ndowana, nkajiunukule kang'wa ni chinkasisimane mbiya sya nsongo. Njigale ni kwapa ligongo lyangune ni lyenu mmwe.”
Kekala katema kala ŵakulijiganya ŵaichilile Che Yesu ni kwausya, “Ana nduni jwaali jwankulungwa mu Umwenye wa kwinani?”
Che Yesu ŵambilasile mwanache, ŵanjimiche mmbujo mwao.
Nipele ŵatite, “Isyene ngunsalila, iŵaga ngankugalauka ni kuŵa mpela ŵanache, nganjinjila kose mu umwenye wa kwinani.
Nipele jwalijose jwakulitimalika mpela aju mwanache ju, jwelejo ni jwali jwankulungwa mu umwenye wa kwinani.
Jwalijose jwakumpochela mwanache jumo mpela aju mu liina lyangu, jwelejo akumbochela une.”
“Nambo jwalijose juchantende jumo jwa achanandi ŵa, ŵakungulupilila une atende sambi, ikaliji yambone kwa ŵelewo ataŵikwe pa lukosi liganga lyekulungwa lya kusyajila ni kumponya mu bahali pakwendesya nnope.
Ulaje chiuŵe kwa ŵandu ŵa pa chilambo kwa ligongo lya kuichisya indu ya kwatenda ŵandu atende sambi. Indu yo ikusachilwa ikopochele nambo ulaje kukwakwe mundu juchaichenawo indu yo.
“Iŵaga nkono wenu pane lukongolo lwenu lukuntenda ntende sambi, mmukate nkaujase kwakutalika. Mmbaya kukwenu kwinjila mu umi pangali nkono umo pane lukongolo lumo kupunda kuponyekwa pa mooto wa moŵa gose pangali mbesi wangasimika ndi ni makono gaŵili ni makongolo gaŵili.
Ni liso lyenu lyantendaga ntende sambi, nlikolopole ni kuliponya kwakutalika. Mmbaya kukwenu kwinjila mu umi wangamala ni liso limo, kupunda kuponyekwa pa mooto wangasimika moŵa gose pangali mbesi ndi ni meeso gaŵili.
“Nlilolechesye! Nkanchembulusya jumo jwa achanandi ŵa. Ngunsalila, achikatumetume ŵao kwinani ko moŵa gose akulola usyo wa Atati ŵaali kwinani.
Pakuŵa Mwana jwa Mundu ŵaiche kukwakulupusya aŵala ŵaŵasochele.
“Ana ŵanyamwe nkuti uli, Mundu akolaga ngondolo mia moja, ni jasochelaga ngondolo jimo, ngaasileka ngondolo tisini na tisa sila pasyaliji po ni kwaula kukujisosa jajisochele jila?
Ajisimanaga, ngunsalila isyene, akusengwa ligongo lya jejila kusipunda tisini na tisa syangasochela sila.
Iyoyo Atati ŵenu ŵa kwinani ngakusaka ata jumo jwa achanandi ŵa kuti asochele.
“Nlongo njenu anleŵelaga, munjaulile nkanlosye chileŵo chakwe nli ŵaŵili pe. Ampilikanilaga chimme mumpatile nlongo njenu.
Nambo iŵaga ngakumpilikanila, munjigale mundu jumo pane ŵaŵili pakuti kwa kang'wa sya ŵaumboni ŵaŵili pane ŵatatu, kila liloŵe likaluche, mpela Malembelo ga Akunnungu yagakuti pakusala.
Akanaga kwapilikanichisya ŵanyawo, muusalile mpingo wa ŵandu ŵakunkulupilila Kilisito. Ni akanaga kuupilikanila mpingo wa ŵandu ŵakunkulupilila Kilisito, mummalanjile yalumo mundu jwangakwamanyilila Akunnungu ni jwakukumbikanya nsongo.
“Ngunsalila isyene, gagali gose gachingakanye pachilambo chigaŵe gamakanikwe kwinani ni gagali gose gachingakunde pachilambo, chigaŵe gamakundikwe kwinani.
“Ngunsalila isyene, ŵaŵili pasikati jenu ajilanaga pachilambo pano kwa chindu chachilichose chichaŵende, Atati ŵangu ŵa kwinani chiŵapanganyichisye chindu cho.
Pakuŵa palipose pakusongangana ŵandu ŵaŵili pane ŵatatu pamo kwa liina lyangu, une ndili pelepo ni ŵanyawo.”
Nipele, che Petulo ŵaichile Che Yesu nikuti, “Ambuje, ana mpwanga aneŵele kalingwa none naalechelesye? Mala saba?”
Che Yesu ŵajanjile, “Ngangunsalila mala saba pe, nambo saba mala sabini.
Kwayele, Umwenye wa kwinani ulandene ni mwenye jumo juŵasakaga kulola achikapolo ŵakwe yatite pakupanganya.
Paŵatandite kulola, ŵannyichisye mundu jumo juŵaliji ni ligambo lya mamilioni kwa mamilioni.
Mundu jo nganakola chakulipa, kwayele ambujegwe ŵalamwile asumisikwe nti kapolo mundu jula ni ŵankwakwe ni achiŵanagwe ni yanayose iŵakwete, kuti ligambo limale.
Nipele, kapolo jula ŵatindiŵele mmbujo pa ambujegwe ni kwaŵenda achitiji, ‘Ambuje mumbililile kaje, none chinanlipe yose.’
Mmbujegwe kapolo jula ŵankolele chanasa, ŵannechelesye ligambo lila, ni kuntendela ajaule.
“Nambo kapolo jula ŵatyosile, ŵansimene jumo jwa achikapolo achinjakwe juŵandaiji mbiya kanandi. Ŵankamwile ni kunkamula pa lukosi achitiji, ‘Nlipe ligambo lyenu!’
Nombe kapolo njakwe jula ŵatindiŵele pa makongolo gakwe ŵanchondelele achitiji, ‘Mumbililile kaje, none chinanlipe yose’.
Nombejo ŵakanile, ŵajawile kukumponya mu nyuumba jakutaŵilwa, mpaka patachilipa ligambo lila.
“Nipele, achikapolo achinjakwe paŵaiweni yeleyo ŵasongoneche nnope, ŵajawile kukwasalila ambuje ŵao yose iyatendekwe.
Pele ambujegwe ŵammilasile ni kunsalila, ‘Ugwe jwakutumichila jwangalumbana nnope! Nannechelesye ligambo lila lyose pamwanjondelele.
Ana nganinsachilwa kunkolela chanasa kapolo njenu jo mpela inatite pakunkolela chanasa mmwe?’
“Nipele mmbujegwe jula ŵatumbile nnope, ŵampeleche katumetume jula kwa ŵakulagasya mpaka pele patachilipa ligambo lyose.
Ni atati ŵangu ŵa kwinani chachintendela iyoyo peyo iŵaga jwalijose mwa ŵanyamwe ngannechelesya mpwakwe ni mtima wakwe wose.”
Che Yesu paŵamasile kuŵecheta gele maloŵe go, ŵatyosile ku Galilaya, ŵapite ku Yudea peesi lusulo lwa Yolodani.
Ŵandu achajinji ŵakuiye ŵelewo kweleko, nombejo ŵalamisye ilwele yao.
Mafalisayo ŵaichile achalingaga achitiji, “Uli, ana ikusachilwa mundu kunleka ŵankwakwe kwa ligongo lililyose?”
Che Yesu ŵajanjile, “Uli, ana nganinsyoma Mmalembelo ga Akunnungu kuti Akunnungu juŵangumbile mundu kutyochela kundanda ŵaagumbile jwannume ni jwankongwe?
Ŵapundile kusala, ‘Kwaligongo lyo jwannume chiŵaaleche atatigwe ni achikulugwe, chalumbikane ni ŵankwakwe, nombe ŵaŵili wo chachiŵa chiilu chimo?’
Kwa yeleyo, ngaaŵa sooni ŵaŵili, nambo chiilu chimo. Nipele chalumbikenye Akunnungu, mundu akachilekanganya.”
Nambo ŵele ŵanyawo ŵausisye, “Nambi kwachichi che Musa ŵatulamwile kuti jwankongwe apegwe talaka ni kunleka?”
Che Yesu ŵajanjile, “Che Musa ŵannechelele nlekangane ni achiŵankwenu kwa ligongo lya kukakatima kwa mitima jenu. Nambo chitandile kundanda nginiŵa yeleyi.
Nipele none ngunsalila ŵanyamwe, mundu juchalekangane ni ŵankwakwe kwaligongo lililyose ni kulombela jwankongwe jwine, ikaŵe kwa ligongo lya chikululu, akutenda chikululu.”
Ŵakulijiganya ŵao ŵaasalile, “Iŵaga yele kwa mundu ni ŵankwakwe, nipele mmbaya kutama pangalombela.”
Che Yesu ŵaasalile, “Ngaŵa ŵanawose ŵakukombola kulipochela liloŵe li, nambo ikaŵe ŵele ŵandu ŵapegwile ni Akunnungu machili ga kulipochela liloŵe li.
Pakuŵa kwana indu yakupisyangana yaikuntendekasya mundu kutama pangalombela, apali ŵaŵaŵelekwe yeleyo, ni ŵane atesilwe ni ŵandu atame ŵangalombela ni ŵane asachile achinsyene atame pangalombela kwaligongo lya umwenye wa kwinani. Jwakukombola kulipochela liloŵe li apochele.”
Nipele ŵannyichisye Che Yesu ŵanache achanandi kuti ŵasajichile makono ni kwapopelela. Nambo ŵakulijiganya ŵao ni ŵakalipile.
Che Yesu ŵatite, “Mwaleche ŵanache aichanje kukwangu ni nkaasiŵila, pakuŵa Umwenye wa kwinani uli wa ŵandu ŵaali mpela ŵanache ŵa.”
Nipele, ŵasajichile makono kuti ŵape upile, ni ŵatyosile pelepo.
Mundu jumo ŵaichile Che Yesu ŵausisye, “Jwakwiganya, ana ndende chindu chi chichili chambone kuti ngapate umi wa moŵa gose pangali mbesi?”
Che Yesu ŵansalile, “Kwachichi nkuusya yankati umbone? Ngapagwa jwambone, nambo jumope yaani Akunnungu. Mwasakaga kwinjila mu umi, ngakamulichisye makanyo.”
Mundu jula ŵausisye, “Makanyo chi?” Che Yesu ŵatite, “Kasimmulaga ni Kasintenda chikululu ni Kasinjiŵa ni Kasinsala ya unami.
Sooni, mwachimbichisye atati ŵenu ni achikulu ŵenu ni Munnonyele njenu mpela inkuti pakulinonyela mwasyene.”
Jwanchanda jula ŵatite, “Makanyo ganagose nagakamulisye chitandile wanache wangu, chisoŵile chindu chi sooni?”
Che Yesu ŵansalile jwelejo, “Mwasakaga kuŵa jwautindimisyo, njaule nkasumisye yose inkwete ni mbiya syo nkaape ŵandu ŵakulaga, nomwe chinkole mbiko kwinani, mwamalaga muunguye.”
Paŵapilikene yele jwele nchanda jo, ŵajawile aninkusongoneka mu ntima, pakuŵa ŵakwete chipanje chachijinji.
Pelepo Che Yesu ŵaasalile ŵakulijiganya ŵao, “Ngunsalila isyene, chiiŵe yakulimba jwachipanje kwinjila mu Umwenye wa kwinani.
Ngunsalila sooni, ili yakwaluka kwa chinyama chachikuŵilanjikwa ngamia kupeleta pachipowo cha sindano, kupunda jwachipanje kwinjila mu umwenye wa Akunnungu.”
Ŵakulijiganya ŵao paŵapilikene yele, ŵasimosile nnope, ŵausisye, “Ŵaani nambi, akukombola kukulupuka?”
Che Yesu ŵalolite, nikuti, “Lyeleli lili lyangakomboleka kwa ŵandu, nambo kwa Akunnungu indu yose ikukomboleka.”
Nipele, che Petulo ŵajanjile, “Nnole, uwe tulesile yose ni kunkuya, chitupate chichi nambi?”
Che Yesu ŵaasalile, “Ngunsalila isyene, Mwana jwa Mundu pachatame pa chitengu cha umwenye cha ukulu wao mu chilambo cha sambano, ŵanyamwe umunguiye chintame mu itengu kumi na mbili ni kusilamula ngosyo kumi na mbili sya ŵandu ŵa ku Isilaeli.
Ni jwalijose jwalesile nyuumba pane achapwakwe pane achalumbugwe pane atatigwe pane achikulugwe pane ŵanache pane migunda, kwa ligongo lyangu, chachipochela mala mia, ni chachinjila mu umi wa moŵa gose pangali mbesi.
Nambo ŵajinji ŵaali ŵandanda sambano chachiŵa ŵambesi ni ŵaali ŵambesi sambano chachiŵa ŵandanda.
“Umwenye wa kwinani ulandene ni mundu jwaali ni ngunda wa sabibu, juŵatyosile kundaŵi pe kukwaŵika ŵandu ŵakulima mu ngunda wao.
Paŵamasile kulangana ni ŵakulima kuti chachalipa chipande chimo cha madini ga feza malinga ni malipilo ga lyuŵa limo, ŵapeleche ku ngunda wa sabibu.
Ŵatyosile saa tatu kundaŵi, ŵaweni ŵane ŵangali ni masengo ali ajimi pakusumichisya malonda.
Ŵaasalile, ‘Njende ni ŵanyamwe ku ngunda wa sabibu, none chinanlipe.’
Nipele, ŵapite. Asyene ngunda ŵala ŵatyosile sooni saa sita ni saa tisa, ŵatesile iyoyo.
Pajaŵandichile saa kumi na moja, ŵatyosile sooni, ŵasimene ŵandu ŵane ali ajimi papopo pakusumisya malonda. Nipele ŵausisye, ‘Kwachichi nkwima apano muusi wose u pangali masengo?’
Ŵajanjile, ‘Pakuŵa ngapagwa mundu jwatupele masengo.’ Nombejo ŵaasalile, ‘Njaule ni ŵanyamwe nkapanganye masengo ku ngunda wa sabibu.’
“Pakwaswele, nsyene ngunda wa sabibu jula ŵansalile jwakulolela masengo gao kuti, ‘Nkaaŵilanje ŵamasengo mwape malipilo gao, kutandila ŵa kumbesi mpaka ŵa kundanda.’
Nipele, ŵaiche ŵele ŵaŵapegwilwe masengo katema ka saa kumi na moja, jwalijose ŵapochele chipande chimo cha madini ga feza.
Ni ŵandanda ŵala paŵaiche ŵaganichisye kuti chapochele yakupunda, nambo nombe ŵanyawo ŵapochele chipande chimo cha madini ga feza yalumo ni achinjao.
Paŵapochele mbiya syao, ŵatandite kwasongonechela asyene ngunda ŵala.
Ŵatite, ‘Aŵaŵa ŵaŵapele masengo kumbesi apangenye masengo kwa katema ka lisaa limo pe, kwachichi ntulipile yalumo ni ŵanyaŵa akuno uweji tupililile masengo gakulimba muusi wose ni lyuŵa lili nkuŵala?’
“Pelepo nsyene ngunda jula ŵanjanjile jumo jwao kuti, ‘Ambusanga, ngangummonela! Ana nganitulangana none kwa malipilo ga chipande chimo cha madini ga feza?
Njigale chichili chenu, njaule kumangwenu. Ngunonyelwa kumpa aju junampele masengo kumbesi yalumo ni mmwe.
Uli, ngangusachilwa kutenda indu ingunonyelwa nkati yose ingwete? Ana nkukola wiwu pakuŵa une ndili jwambone?’ ”
Nipele Che Yesu ŵamalichisye kwa kusala, “Iyoyo ŵaali ŵambesi chachiŵa ŵandanda ni ŵaali ŵandanda chachiŵa ŵambesi.”
Che Yesu paŵaliji nkukwela kwaula ku Yelusalemu, ŵaajigele ŵakulijiganya ŵao kumi na mbili, paŵaliji nkwenda mwitala, peuto pangali ŵandu ŵane, ŵaasalile,
“Nnole! Tukwaula ku Yelusalemu, ni kwele Mwana jwa Mundu chakatajikwe mmakono mwa achakulu ŵambopesi ni ŵakwiganya Malajisyo, nombewo chalamulikwe aulajikwe.
Chakampeleche kwa ŵandu ŵangaŵa Ŵayahudi apate kuntendela chanache ni kumputa mbokola ni kwaŵamba pa nsalaba ni pa lyuŵa lyaatatu chachisyuka.”
Nipele achikulu ŵa ŵanache ŵa che Sebedayo ŵaichile Che Yesu, pamo ni achiŵanagwe, ŵatindiŵalile ni kwaŵenda chindu.
Che Yesu ŵammusisye, “Chichi nkusaka?” Ŵatite, “Choonde nlanje kuti mu umwenye wenu, achiŵanangu ŵaŵili ŵa chatame, jumo kundyo kwenu ni jwine kunchiji kwenu.”
Che Yesu ŵajanjile, “Ana nkumanyilila chinkuchiŵenda! Uli chinkombole kuching'welela chikombe cha masauko chiching'wele une?” Ŵanyawo ŵajanjile, “Tukupakombola.”
Che Yesu ŵaasalile, “Isyene chinng'welele chikombe changu cha masauko, nambo kutama kundyo ni kunchiji kwangu nganigaŵa masengo gangu nambo Akunnungu chachapa lipesa lyo ŵele ŵaŵakolochesye.”
Nombe ŵakulijiganya ŵane likumi ŵala paŵapilikene gele, ŵatumbilile ŵaŵili wo.
Nipele Che Yesu ŵaaŵilasile ni kwasalila, “Nkumanyilila kuti mamwenye ŵa ilambo akwalongosya ŵandu ŵao kwa machili, ni achakulu ŵao akwatenda ali ŵandu ŵao.
Nambo inaŵe yele kukwenu, nambo jwalijose jwakusaka kuŵa jwamkulungwa kukwenu akusachilwa aŵe katumetume jwa wose.
Ni jwalijose jwakusaka kuŵa jwaandanda kukwenu akusachilwa aŵe jwakutumichila jwenu.
Iyoyopeyo, Mwana jwa Mundu nganaika kuti atumichilwe nambo kuti atumichile, ni kuutyosya umi wakwe kuti gaŵe malipilo kwa ligongo lya chiwombolo cha ŵandu ŵajinji.”
Che Yesu ni ŵakulijiganya ŵao paŵaliji nkutyoka ku Yeliko, mpingo wa ŵandu ŵaliji nkwakuya.
Nipele, ŵapali ŵangalola ŵaŵili uŵatemi mungulugulu litala, nombewo paŵapikene kuti Che Yesu ŵaliji nkupita pelepo, ŵanyanyisye achitiji, “Ambuje, Mwana ju che Daudi, choonde ntukolele chanasa!”
Mpingo wa ŵandu wakalipile ni kwasalila amyalale. Nambo ŵanyawo ŵapundangenye kunyanyisya, achitiji, “Ambuje, Mwana ju che Daudi, choonde ntukolele chanasa!”
Che Yesu ŵajimi, ŵaaŵilasile ni kwausya, “Ana nkusaka nampanganyichisye ichichi?”
Ŵajanjile, “Ambuje, tukummenda gaunukuche meeso getu.”
Nipele, Che Yesu ŵakolele chanasa, ŵakwaiye meeso gao ni papopo ŵakombwele kulola, ni ŵankuiye.
Che Yesu pamo ni ŵakulijiganya ŵao ŵaŵandichile ku Yelusalemu, ni paŵaiche ku Besefage pachikwesya cha Miseituni, ŵatumile ŵakulijiganya ŵaŵili.
Ŵaasalile, “Njaule kunsinda wauli mmbujo mwenu, ni kweleko chinkajisimane mbunda jajitaŵikwe ni mwanambunda pamo najo. Nkaagopole njise nawo kwangune.
Iŵaga chakammusye mundu ligongo lya kwagopola, nkajile, ‘Ambuje akusisaka,’ ni pangakaŵa chakannechele.”
Ali lyatendekwe kuti gamalile gaŵaŵechete jwakulondola jwa Akunnungu.
“Mwasalile ŵandu ŵa musi wa Sayuni, Nnole, Mwenye jwenu akunnyichilila! Atulele, ni akwesile mbunda, ni mwanambunda, chinyama chachikujigala itutule.”
Ŵakulijiganya ŵala ŵajawile, ŵatesile mpela iŵatite pakusalilwa ni Che Yesu.
Ŵajiichenawo mbunda ni mwanambunda, ŵatandiche nguo syao pachanya pawo ni Che Yesu ŵatemi pachanya pakwe.
Mpingo wekulungwa wa ŵandu watandiche nguo syao mwitala, ni ŵane ŵakatile nyambi sya mwana sya itela ni ŵatandiche mwitala.
Mipingo ja ŵandu ŵaŵalongolele ni ŵaŵakuiye ŵanyanyisye achitiji, “Ajinichilwe Mwana ju che Daudi, Akole upile jwele jwakwika mu liina lya Ambuje! Ajinichilwe Akunnungu ŵaali kwinani!”
Che Yesu paŵajinjilaga ku Yelusalemu, ŵandu ŵa musi wose ŵaliji jugulijuguli. Ŵandu ŵaliji nkuusyana, “Ana aju ali nduni?”
Ŵandu mu mpingo ula ŵatite, “Ŵeleŵa ni Che Yesu, jwakulondola jwa Akunnungu kutyochela ku Nasaleti musi wa ku Galilaya.”
Nipele, Che Yesu ŵajinjile mu lutenje lwa Nyuumba ja Akunnungu, ŵaaŵinjile ŵanawose uŵasumisyaga ni kusuma malonda pepala, ŵapitikwisye mesa sya ŵaŵasumanyaga mbiya, ni itengu yao ŵaŵasumisyaga nguunda.
Ŵaasalile, “Ilembekwe Mmalembelo ga Akunnungu, ‘Nyuumba jangu chijiŵilanjikwe nyuumba ja kupopelela.’ Nambo ŵanyamwe njitesile peuto pakulisisila ŵa wiyi.”
Ŵangalola ni ŵakulemala ŵanjaulile pa Nyuumba ja Akunnungu, nombe Che Yesu ŵalamisye.
Achakulu ŵambopesi ni ŵakwiganya Malajisyo paŵaiweni indu yambone nnope iŵaitesile Che Yesu ni ŵanache ali nkunyanyisya pa Nyuumba ja Akunnungu achitiji, “Ajinichilwe Mwana ju che Daudi,” ŵanyawo ŵatumbile.
Ŵausisye, “Uli ngankupilikana yakuti ŵanache?” Che Yesu ŵajanjile, “Elo, ngupikana! Ana nganinsyome Maloŵe ga? ‘Kutyochela nkang'wa sya ŵanache achanandi ni ŵakonga, nlipatile lumbili lwemalilwe.’ ”
Nipele, ŵalesile, ŵakopweche mmusi ni kwaula ku Besania ni kugona kweleko.
Kundaŵi, Che Yesu paŵaujaga kwaula ku Yelusalemu, jakwete sala.
Ŵauweni ntini mungulugulu litala, ŵaujaulile, nambo nganachisimana chindu mwelemo, ŵausimene uli masamba pe. Ŵausalile, “Nkasogola isogosi sooni moŵa gose pangali mbesi!” Papopo nkuju wo wanyasile.
Ŵakulijiganya paŵauweni, ŵasimosile, ŵaliusisye, “Ntini u ujumwile chinauli chitema kwantinyi?”
Che Yesu ŵajanjile, “Ngunsalila isyene, mwaŵaga ni chikulupi pangali lipamba lili lyose, chinkombole kupanganya ngaŵa yeleyo pe yaitendekwe mu chitela cha ntini, nambo atamuno mwachisalilaga achi chitumbi chi, ‘Ntupuche ni kuliponya mu bahali,’ chiitendekwe iyoyo.
Mwakolaga chikulupi, chachilichose chachimmende nkupopela, chimpate.”
Che Yesu ŵajinjile pa Nyuumba ja Akunnungu, ni kwiganya. Paŵajiganyaga, achakulu ŵa mbopesi ni achakulu ŵane ŵa ŵandu ŵausisye kuti, “Ana kwa ukombole chi nkutenda yele indu yi? Ŵaani ŵampele wele ukombole u?”
Che Yesu ŵajanjile, “None chinammusye liusyo limo pe, mwanyangaga, nipele, none chinansalile kwa ukombole chi nguitenda indu yi.
Uli ukombole u che Yohana wa kubatisya watyochele kwapi? Watyochele kwinani pane kwa ŵandu?” Nambo ŵaŵechetesyene achinsyene pe achitiji, “Twajilaga, ‘Watyosile kwinani,’ chatuusye, ‘Nambi kwachichi nganimunkulupilila?’
Nambo twajilaga, ‘Watyochele kwa ŵandu,’ tukogopa mpingo wa ŵandu pakuŵa ŵanawose akwitichisya kuti che Yohana ali jwakulondola jwa Akunnungu.”
Nipele, ŵajanjile, “Ngatukumanyilila!” Nombe Che Yesu ŵatite, “Atamuno une ngangunsalila ŵanyamwe kwa ukombole chi nguitenda indu yi.
“Ŵanyamwe nkuganisya uli? Mundu jumo ŵakwete achachanda ŵaŵili. Ŵantendele jwaandanda jo kuti, ‘Mwanangu, lelo njaule nkapanganye masengo mungunda wa sabibu.’
Nchanda jo ŵajanjile, ‘Ngangusaka!’ Nambo kanyuma kakwe ŵapitikwiche ntima, ŵajawile kupanganya masengo.
Atati ŵala ŵanjaulile mwanagwe jwaaŵili jo ni kunsalila ilaila, nombe ŵajanjile ŵatite, ‘Elo, atati!’ Nambo nganajaula kumasengo.
Ana jwapi jwa ŵele ŵaŵili wo jwatesile yakuisaka atatigwe?” Ŵajanjile, “Jwanchanda jwaandanda jo.” Che Yesu ŵatite, “Ngunsalila isyene, ŵakukumbikanya nsongo ni ŵakulaŵalaŵa chajinjile mu Umwenye wa Akunnungu nkanaŵe kwinjila.
Pakuŵa che Yohana ŵaiche kukwenu ni kunnanjila kutama yambone nti yakuti pakusaka Akunnungu, ni ŵanyamwe nganimunkulupilila, nambo ŵakukumbikanya nsongo ni ŵakulaŵalaŵa ŵankulupilile. Ni ŵanyamwe pammasile kugawona gele nganinleka sambi ni kunkulupilila.”
Che Yesu ŵatite, “Mpilikanile chitagu chine. Jwapali mundu jumo nsyene nyuumba ŵalimile ngunda wa sabibu, ŵausyunguchisye lutenje ni ŵakolosisye pakuminyila sabibu, ŵataŵile chilindo mmomopemo. Nipele ŵaujasimisye kwa ŵakulima ni kwaula ku chilambo cha kutalika.
Katema ka kugungula, ŵatumile achikapolo ŵao kwa ŵakulima ŵala, kuti akajigale liunjili lyakwe lya magungulo.
Ŵakulima ŵala ŵakamwile achikapolo ŵao, jumo ŵamputile, ni jwine ŵammuleje, ni jwine ŵamponyile maganga.
Sooni ŵatumile achikapolo ŵane ŵajinji kupunda ŵa kundanda. Ŵakulima ŵala ŵajasime ngunda ŵatendele ilaila.
Kumbesi kwakwe ŵantumile mwanagwe achiganisyaga mu ntima wakwe achitiji, ‘Chakanchimbichisye mwanangu.’
Nambo ŵakulima ŵala paŵammweni mwanagwao ŵaŵechetesyene achinsyene pe, ‘Aju ni juchapochele iŵagosele, twende tummulaje kuti indu iŵagosele tujigale uwe!’
Nipele, ŵankamwile, ŵantyosisye paasa ngunda wa sabibu, ŵammuleje.
“Sambano, nsyene ngunda wa sabibu jula pachachiika, chachatenda ichichi ŵakulima ŵala?”
Ŵanyawo ŵajanjile, “Chachajonanga wamba ŵele ŵachigongomalo wo ni ngunda wa sabibu ula chachiujasimisya kwa ŵakulima ŵane uchachapa liunjili lyakwe lya magungulo kwa katema kakwe.”
Pelepo Che Yesu ŵaasalile, “Uli ana nganinsyome lye liloŵe li Mmalembelo ga Akunnungu? ‘Liganga liŵalikanile ŵakutaŵa sambano lilyolyo lili lyetendekwe liganga lyalikusachilwa kwannope kugapunda maganga gose. Ambuje ni ŵatesile achi chindu chi, nombe chili chakusimonjeka nnope kwetuwe!’
“Kwayele ngunsalila, Umwenye wa Akunnungu chiutyosekwe kukwenu, ni kupegwa ŵandu ŵakupanganya yakuisaka Akunnungu.”
Jwalijose juchagwilile pa liganga lyo chakasiche ipande ipande, ni jwalijose juchilyagwilile, chilinkanyatekanyate.
Achakulu ŵa mbopesi ni Mafalisayo paŵapilikene itagu yao, ŵamanyilile kuti ŵaliji nkwagamba ŵanyawo.
Nipele ŵasosaga litala lya kwakamula, nambo ŵajogwepe ŵandu pakuŵa ŵanyawo ŵanganisisye nti jwakulondola jwa Akunnungu.
Che Yesu ŵaŵechetenawo sooni kwa itagu achitiji,
“Umwenye wa kwinani ulandene ni mwenye jumpepe juŵantendele mwanagwe chindimba cha chakulya cha ulombela.
Nipele ŵatumile achikapolo ŵao kukwaŵilanga ŵaalaliche kwika ku ulombela, nambo ŵakanile kwika.
Ŵaatumile sooni achikapolo ŵane, achitiji, ‘Mwasalile ŵalalichikwe ŵala kuti, jwammale kolosya yakulya yangu, sikite ng'ombe jangu ja nkambaku ni ng'ombe sine syakunakana, inayose ili chile, njise ku ulombela.’
Nambo ŵandu ŵala ŵakanile kwika, ŵajawile, jumo ku ngunda wakwe, ni jwine ku masengo gakwe,
ni ŵane ŵaakamwile achikapolo ŵala ŵaputile ni ŵane kwaulaga.
Mwenye jula ŵatumbile, ŵaatumile ŵandu ŵangondo ŵao kuti akaaulaje ŵakuulaga ŵala ni kuchoma mooto musi wao.
Nipele ŵaasalile achikapolo ŵao, ‘Ulombela uli chile, nambo unalaliche ŵala nganaŵajilwa.
Nipele njaule mmalekano ni ŵanawose uchinkaasimane, nkaaŵilanje aichanje ku chindimba cha chakulya cha ulombela.’
Achikapolo ŵao ŵala ŵatyosile, ŵajawile mmatala, ŵaichenawo wose uŵasimene nawo, ŵangalumbana ni ŵambone. Nyuumba ja ulombela jagumbele achalendo.
“Nambo paŵajinjile mwenye ku kwalola achalendo, ŵammweni mundu jumo jwanganatakula nguo sya ulombela.
Mwenye ŵammusisye, ‘Ambusanga, njinjile chinauli, nomwe nganinkola nguo sya ulombela?’ Nambo ŵelewo ŵamyalele.
Nipele, mwenye ŵaasalile achikatumetume ŵao, ‘Muntaŵe makongolo ni makono, mkamponye paasa ku chipi, kweleko chakalile ni kuchilimya meeno.’ ”
Che Yesu ŵamalichisye achitiji, “Ŵajinji ŵakuŵilanjikwa, nambo ŵasagulikwe nganatupa.”
Nipele, Mafalisayo ŵajawile, ŵajilene itajile pa kwatanjisya Che Yesu kwa maloŵe gao.
Nipele, ŵaatumile ŵakulijiganya ŵao, pamo ni ŵakulijiganya ŵa mumpingo u che Helode ku Che Yesu. Ŵausisye achitiji, “Jwakwiganya, tukumanyilila kuti mmwe ndi mundu jwakulupilichika, nkwiganya litala lya Akunnungu kwa usyene, pangaganisya ŵandu akusala chichi, pakuŵa ngankulola ukulu wa mundu.
Sambano, ntusalile, nkuganisya ichichi? Uli ili yambone kulipa nsongo kwa mwenye jwankulu jwa ku Loma pane akuŵilanjikwa che Kaisali, pane tunalipe?”
Nambo Che Yesu ŵaumanyilile nningwa wao wangalumbana, ŵaasalile, “Kwachichi nkuuninga, ŵanyamwe ŵaulamba?
Munosye mbiya ja kulipila nsongo.” Nombewo ŵaiche nawo likobili.
Nipele, Che Yesu ŵausisye, “Aku ku meeso ku ni liina li ya ŵaani?”
Ŵajanjile, “Che Kaisali.” Pelepo Che Yesu ŵaasalile ŵanyawo kuti, “Nipele, i che Kaisali mwapeje che Kaisali, ni ya Akunnungu mwapeje Akunnungu.”
Paŵagapilikene gele ŵasimosile, ŵalesile, ŵajawile.
Lye lyuŵa lyo, Masadukayo ŵane ŵakuti ngapagwa kusyuka ŵaichilile Che Yesu,
nipele, ŵausisye, “Jwakwiganya, che Musa ŵatite mundu jwalombele awaga pangaleka ŵanache, ikusachilwa mpwakwe annombele jwankongwe jwawililwe ni ŵankwakwe, kuti ammelechele ŵanache nkulugwe.
Nipele, pa musi petu pano ŵapali ŵandu saba ŵaŵapagwile lutumbo lumo. Jwaandanda jo ŵalombele ni ŵawile pangali ŵanache, ni mpwakwe ŵannombile jwankongwe jula.
Iyoyo yaliji kwa jwaaŵili jula ni jwaatatu ni mpaka ŵanawose saba.
Paŵamasile kuwa ŵanawose saba, jwankongwe jula ŵawile.
Nambi, pa lyuŵa lya kusyuka jwele jwankongwe chaŵe jwa ŵaani mwa ŵele saba wo? Pakuŵa wose saba ŵannombile.”
Che Yesu ŵajanjile ŵanyawo, “Ŵanyamwe nkosele pakuŵa ngankugamanyilila Malembelo ga Akunnungu atamuno ukombole wa Akunnungu.
Pakuŵa pachachisyuka ŵawe ngalombela atamuno kulombwa, chaaŵe mpela achikatumetume ŵa kwinani.
Nambo yankati kusyuka kwa ŵawe, uli, nganinsyoma aila iŵansalile Akunnungu? Ŵansalile,
‘Une ndili Akunnungu ŵa che Iblahimu ni Akunnungu ŵa che Isaka ni Akunnungu ŵa che Yakobo.’ Nipele ŵele nganaŵa Akunnungu ŵa ŵawe, nambo ŵa ŵajumi.”
Mpingo wa ŵandu ula paŵapilikene yeleyo, ŵagasimosile majiganyo gao.
Mafalisayo paŵapilikene kuti Che Yesu ŵamyalesye Masadukayo, ŵasongangene pamo.
Jumo jwao, ŵakwiganya malajisyo, ŵausisye Che Yesu achalingaga kuti,
“Jwakwiganya, likanyo chi lyalili lyekulungwa mu Malajisyo?”
Che Yesu ŵanjanjile, “ ‘Mwanonyele Ambuje Akunnungu ŵenu ni ntima wenu wose ni mbumu jenu jose ni lunda lwenu lose.’
Alili ni likanyo lyekulungwa ni lyaandanda.
Ni lyaaŵili lyalikulandana ni lyele, lili, ‘Munnonyele njenu mpela yankuti pakulinonyela mwasyene.’
Malajisyo gose ga Akunnungu gaŵapele che Musa ni majiganyo ga ŵakulondola ŵa Akunnungu gakukulupilila ge makanyo gaŵili ga.”
Paŵasongangene pamo Mafalisayo, Che Yesu ŵausisye,
“Ŵanyamwe nkuganisya uli yankati Kilisito? Uli ali mwanagwao ŵaani?” Ŵajanjile, “Ŵa che Daudi.”
Che Yesu ŵaasalile, “Nipele, kwachichi che Daudi kwa ukombole wa Mbumu jwa Akunnungu akwaŵilanga Ambuje? Pakuŵa ŵatite,
‘Ambuje ŵaasalile Ambuje ŵangu, ntame kundyo, mpaka pachinaaŵiche ŵammagongo ŵenu paasi pa makongolo genu.’
Nipele, iŵaga che Daudi akwaŵilanga Kilisito ‘Ambuje’ ikukomboleka chinauli kuti ali mwanagwao?”
Ngapagwa mundu jwalijose juŵakombwele kwanga. Chitandile lyuŵa lyo ngapagwa juŵalinjile sooni kummusya.
Nipele, Che Yesu ŵausalile mpingo wa ŵandu ni ŵakulijiganya ŵao kuti,
“Ŵakwiganya malajisyo ni Mafalisayo akwete ukombole wa kusala uchenene Malajisyo.
Kwalye ligongo lyo mpikanichisye ni kutenda chachili chose chichansalile. Nambo nkasyasya isambo yao, pakuŵa ngakutenda yele yakuisala yo.
Akutaŵanga misigo jakutopela ni kwatwika ŵandu mmakoyo, nambo ŵele achinsyene wo ngakusaka atamuno kukwaya ni chala.
Ŵanyawo akugatenda masengo gao gose kuti apate kuloleka ni ŵandu. Akuwala indu yailembekwe malembelo ga malajisyo pachanya meeso ni konjechesya ukulu wa nguo syao kuti aloleche ali ŵandu ŵa Akunnungu.
Ikwanonyela kutama peuto pa kuchimbichikwa mu indimba ni itengu ya kuchimbichikwa mmajumba ga kupopelela.
Ikwanonyela kwakomasya kwa kwachimbichisya pa kusumichisya malonda ni kusaka ŵandu ŵaŵilanje, ‘Jwakwiganya.’
Nambo ŵanyamwe nkaŵilanjikwa ‘Jwakwiganya,’ pakuŵa jwakwiganya jwenu ali jumo pe, ni wose ndi achalongo.
Atamuno ngasimummilanga mundu ‘Atati’ pa chilambo pano, pakuŵa Atati ŵetu ali ŵamo pe, ŵaali kwinani.
Atamuno ngasimmilanjikwa ‘ilongola’ pakuŵa chilongola jwenu ali jumo pe, yaani Kilisito.
Nombe jwali jwankulungwa jwenu chaaŵe katumetume jwenu.
Jwakulikwesya chatuluswe ni jwakulitulusya chachikweswa.
“Ulaje uwe kukwenu ŵakwiganya Malajisyo ni Mafalisayo, ŵaulamba! Pakuŵa nkuugala nnango wa Umwenye wa kwinani mmbujo pa ŵandu. Ni ŵanyamwe mwachinsyene ngankwinjila, atamuno ngankwaleka ŵakusaka kwinjila ajinjile.
Ulaje uwe kukwenu ŵakwiganya Malajisyo ni Mafalisayo, ŵaulamba! Nkwasumula ŵawililwe ni achiŵankwawo ipanje yao nchilitendaga ŵandu ŵambone nkupopela mapopelo gamaleu, kwa lye ligongo lyo kulaga kwenu chikuŵe kwakukulungwa nnope.
“Ulaje uwe kukwenu ŵakwiganya Malajisyo ni Mafalisayo, ŵaulamba! Pakuŵa nkutaŵa ulendo mu bahali ni pa chilambo kuti nkombole kuntenda namose mundu jumo aŵe jwa kunkuya mwanya. Pankumpata, nkuntenda aŵe mundu jwakwinjila ku jehanamu kumpunda mwachinsyene.
“Ulaje uwe kukwenu ilongola ŵangalola! Ŵanyamwe nkutinji mundu alumbililaga kwa Nyuumba ja Akunnungu, kwele kulumbila ko ngaŵa chindu, nambo alumbililaga kwa sahabu ja Nyuumba ja Akunnungu, kwele kulumbilila ko kukwakanganichisya kuchitenda chalumbilile.
Ŵanyamwe ŵangalola ŵakuloŵela! Chapi chachili cha malumbo nnope, sahabu pane Nyuumba ja Akunnungu jajikujitenda sahabu jiŵe jeswela?
Sooni nkutinji mundu alumbililaga pa chilisa ngaŵa chindu, nambo alumbilaga nkujikolanga mbopesi jajili pa chilisa, kwele kulumbilila ko kukwakanganichisya kuchitenda chalumbilile.
Ŵanyamwe ŵangalola! Ana kulumbilila chi kwakuli kwamalumbo nnope, kwa mbopesi pane kwa chilisa chachikujitenda mbopesi jiŵe jeswela?
Jwakulumbila kwa chilisa akulumbilila kwa chele chilisa cho, ni kwa chose chachili pachanya pakwe.
Ni jwakulumbila kwa Nyuumba ja Akunnungu akulumbilila kwa Nyuumba ja Akunnungu ni kwa jwele jwakutama nkati mo.
Nombe jwakulumbila kwa kwinani akulumbilila kwa chitengu cha Umwenye wa Akunnungu, ni kwa jwele jwakutama pachanya pakwe.
“Ulaje uwe kukwenu ŵakwiganya Malajisyo ni Mafalisayo, ŵaulamba! Nkupochela mbopesi kwa ŵandu, atamuno pa masamba ga kununjila, ni bisali ni jila, nkuileka indu yekulungwa yailajichikwe ni Malajisyo mpela ila kupanganya yaikwanonyelesya Akunnungu ni chanasa ni chikulupi. Gelega ni gankusachilwa kugakamulisya pangagaliŵalila gane.
ilongola ŵangalola! Nkujityosya membe mu yakung'wa, nambo nkuchimila chinyama chachikuŵilanjikwa ngamia!
“Ulaje uwe kukwenu ŵakwiganya Malajisyo ni Mafalisayo, ŵaulamba! Nkosya chikombe ni mbale kwa paasa, nambo nkati nkuleka indu impatile kwa wiyi ni nsese.
Ugwe Mfalisayo jwangalola! Njosye chikombe nkati kaje ni paasa chipasalale.
“Ulaje uwe kukwenu ŵakwiganya Malajisyo ni Mafalisayo, ŵaulamba! Pakuŵa nkulandana ni malembe gagasililwe ni chokaa, nombe kwa paasa gakuwoneka kuŵa gambone, nambo nkati mwakwe gagumbele maupa ga ŵawe ni usakwa wejinji.
Iyoyopeyo ni ŵanyamwe kwa paasa nkuoneka ni ŵandu kuŵa ŵambone nambo nkati ngumbele ulamba ni ungalimate.
“Ulaje uwe kukwenu ŵakwiganya Malajisyo ni Mafalisayo, ŵaulamba! Nkugumba malembe ga ŵakulondola ŵa Akunnungu ni kugasalalisya malembe ga ŵandu ŵambone.
Nkutinji, ‘Tukaapali kalakala katema ka achambuje ŵetu, ngatukaŵe pamo mmaulajo ga ŵakulondola ŵa Akunnungu!’
Kwakuŵecheta yeleyo nkulilosya mwachinsyene kuti ŵanyamwe ndi achiŵana ŵa aŵala ŵaŵauleje ŵakulondola ŵa Akunnungu.
Hayaga, mmalichisye masengo gaŵachokwele achambuje ŵenu!
Ŵanyamwe ŵa uŵelesi wa lijoka lya sumu! Chimmutuche chinauli ulamusi wa ku jehanamu?
Nipele lye ligongo lyo une ngumpelechela ŵanyamwe ŵakulondola ŵa Akunnungu, ŵandu ŵa lunda ni ŵakwiganya malajisyo, ŵane mwa ŵanyawo chimwaulaje ni kwaŵamba pa nsalaba, ni ŵane chimwapute ibokola mmajumba genu ga kupopelela ni kwasosa mmisi jinajose.
Nipele chileŵo chichiŵe kukwenu kwa ligongo lya miasi ja ŵandu ŵambone jajijitiche mu chilambo muno. Elo chitandile chiwa chi che Habili jwanganakola chileŵo mpaka chi che Sakalia, mwana ju che Balakia, jumwammuleje pa Nyuumba ja Akunnungu pasikati ja papaswela ni chilisa.
Isyene ngunsalila kuti, ŵandu ŵa uŵelesi u chalamulikwe kwa ligongo lya indu yi.
“Yelusalemu! Ugwe Yelusalemu! Nkwaulaga ŵakulondola ŵa Akunnungu ni kwaputa maganga ŵelewo ŵaŵatumikwe kukwenu. Ana kalingwa nasachile kwasonganganya achiŵana ŵenu, mpela nguku ijikuti pakwasonganganya achiŵanagwe kusi kwa mapapiko gakwe, nambo mwakanile.
Ayaga nipele, nyuumba jenu chijisigale lisame pe.
Ngunsalila, ngamuumona sooni mpaka pachinchiti, ‘Akole upile jwele jwakwika mu liina lya Ambuje.’ ”
Che Yesu ŵakopweche pa Nyuumba ja Akunnungu, ni paŵajaulaga, ŵakulijiganya ŵao ŵajaulile ni kwalosya majumba ga Nyuumba ja Akunnungu.
Che Yesu ŵaasalile, “Elo, gose gankugawona ga! Isyene ngunsalila kuti, ngapagwa liganga namuno limo lichilisigale pa line, kila chindu chichijonasikwe.”
Che Yesu paŵatemi ku chitumbi cha Miseituni, ŵakulijiganya ŵajaulile pa chisyepela, ŵausisye, “Ntusalile ana gelega chigatyochele chakachi? Ni chimanyisyo chi chakutulosya kwika kwenu ni kumbesi kwa chilambo chino?”
Che Yesu ŵajanjile, “Nlilolechesye kuti akaika kunnambusya mundu.
Pakuŵa achajinji chakopochele aninkuti, une ndili Kilisito nombewo chachasoyasya ŵandu ŵajinji.
Chimpikane yankati ngondo ni kusongona yankati ngondo, nambo nkatojima, pakuŵa gelega gakusachilwa gatyochele kaje, nambo kumbesi kwakwe kukanaŵe.
Chilambo chimo chichiputane ni chine, umwenye umo chiuputane ni wine. Kosekose kuchichiŵa ni sala ni chindendemesi cha chilambo.
Aga ganagose ga gali mpela kutanda kwa chilungusi.
“Nipele chachintyosya kuti ansausye ni kummulaga. Chinchichimwa ni ŵandu ŵa ilambo yose ligongo lya liina lyangu.
Sooni, achajinji chachileche chikulupi chao, chachigalaukana ni kuchimana jwine ni jwine.
Chachikopochela ŵakulondola ŵa unami achajinji chiŵalambusye ŵandu ŵajinji
Ligongo lya winji wa ungalimate, unonyelo wa ŵandu ŵajinji chiuchinandupa.
Nambo jwalijose juchapililile mpaka kumbesi, jwelejo ni juchakulupuche.
Nambo, kukanaŵe kwika kumbesi, aji Ngani Jambone ja umwenye wa Akunnungu chijilalichikwe pa chilambo chose jiŵe umboni kwa ilambo yose.
“Nipele, pachinchione ‘Chindu cha soni chachikusakasya Nyuumba ja Akunnungu’ chichaŵechetekwe ni che Danieli, jwakulondola jwa Akunnungu kuti chijimi peuto papaswela, ŵakusyoma amanyilile malumbo gakwe.
Pelepo, ŵaali ku Yudea autuchile kumatumbi.
Jwaali pachanya nyuumba akatuluka ni kwinjila nkati kukwigala chindu.
Jwaali ku migunda akauja panyuma kukwigala nguo jao.
Ulaje kukwao ŵele utachiŵa pachiilu ni ŵachajonjesye gele moŵa go!
Mpopele kuti kuutuka kwenu kunaŵe katema ka mbepo, atamuno Lyuŵa lya Kupumulila!
Pakuŵa kele katema ko chikupagwe kulaga kwakukulungwa kwati nganikupagwe chitandile kugumbikwa chilambo chino mpaka sambano, atamuno ngali pachikutyochele sooni.
Iŵaga gele moŵa go ngagakapunguchikwe, ngapagwa mundu jwakakulupwiche, nambo gele moŵa go chigapunguchikwe kwa ligongo lya ŵele ŵaŵasagulikwe.
“Nipele, kele katema ko mundu aikaga kunsalila, ‘Kilisito ali apa’ pane ‘Ali akuno,’ nkakulupilila.
Pakuŵa chachikopochela ŵanya kilisito ŵa unami ni ŵakulondola ŵa unami. Chachitenda imanyisyo yaikulungwa ni yakusimonjeka ya kwalambusya ŵandu yakombolekaga namose ŵasagulikwe ŵa Akunnungu.
Mpilikane, nanjamwiche chile kakanaŵe katema.
Nipele, ansalilaga kuti, ‘Nnole, ali mwipululu,’ nkajaula kweleko, pane ‘Nnole, ali munkati,’ nkakulupilila.
Pakuŵa, mpela njasi ijikuti kumesya kutyochela kungopochelo lyuŵa mpaka kulikutiŵila lyuŵa, iyoyo peyo ni ichijile kwika kwa Mwana jwa Mundu.
Pele pauli ntembo, ni patachisongangana achikapungu.
“Nambo nkumala kulaga kwa ge moŵa go, lyuŵa chilipilile, ni lwesi ngalulanguchisya, ni ndondwa sisipatuche kutyochela kwinani ni machili ga kwinani chigachitinganyika.
Nipele, chimanyisyo cha Mwana jwa Mundu chichioneche kwinani, pelepo ŵandu wose ŵa pa chilambo chalile, Chachimmona Mwana jwa Mundu ali nkwika pachanya maunde ga kwiunde, ni machili ni ukulu wekulungwa.
Nombe chachatuma achikatumetume ŵao ŵa kwinani ali akamulile mapenga ga kusona nnope, ni ŵanyawo chachasonganganya ŵandu ŵao uŵasagulikwe kutyochela mbande syose ncheche sya chilambo, chitandile aji mbesi ja kwinani mpaka aji mbesi ji.
“Kwa chitela cha ntini nlijiganye achi chitagu chi, Paukutanda kola nyambi ni kusipuka masamba, ŵanyamwe nkumanyilila kuti katema ka chuuku kaŵandichile.
Iyoyo peyo ŵanyamwe pachingaone aga gose ga gali nkutendekwa, mmanyilile kuti katema ka une kuuja kaŵandichile.
Isyene ngunsalila, Au uŵelesi u ngaupita gakanaŵe kutendekwa aga gose ga.
Kwinani ni chilambo chiichipita, nambo maloŵe gangu ngagapita ng'o.
“Nambo, yankati lyuŵa ni saa, ngapagwa ŵakuimanyilila chakachi chiikopochele, atamuno achikatumetume ŵa kwinani, atamuno Mwana, Atati jika pe ni ŵakumanyilila.
Pakuŵa yaitite mmoŵa ga che Nuhu, ni iyoyo ichichiŵa kwika kwa Mwana jwa Mundu.
Pakuŵa gele moŵa go, chikumba meesi chachikulungwa chikanaŵe, ŵandu ŵalyaga ni kung'wa, ni ŵalombelaga ni kulombwa, mpaka lye lyuŵa lyo che Nuhu paŵajinjile mu safina.
Nganamanyilila mpaka chikumba meesi pachaiche ni kwakumba wose. Ni iyoyo ichichiŵa kwika kwa Mwana jwa Mundu.
Kele katema ko ŵandu ŵaŵili chachiŵa ku ngunda, jumo chachijigalikwa ni jwine kulekwa.
Achakongwe ŵaŵili chachiŵa aninkusyaga, jumo chachijigalikwa ni jwine kulekwa.
Nipele, nlilolechesye, pakuŵa ngankumanyilila lyuŵa chi litaiche Ambuje wenu.
Nambo nkumbuchile lyeleli, kuti akaimanyi nsyene nyuumba katema chi jwawiyi pataiche, akachesisye, ngakajileche nyuumba jakwe jijonasikwe.
Kwalye ligongo lyo, ŵanyamwe nliŵiche chile, pakuŵa ngankumanyilila katema kachaiche Mwana jwa Mundu.”
Che Yesu ŵapundile kuŵecheta, “Nipele nduni jwali jwakutumichila jwakukulupilichika ni lunda, jwati ambujegwe chammiche pachanya pa ŵandu ŵao, ŵape chakulya katema kakwe?
Jwana upile jwakutumichila jo pataiche ambujegwe juchansimane aninkutendekanya yeleyo.
Isyene ngunsalila, chachimmika jwele katumetume jo alindilile chipanje chakwe chose.
Nambo jwakutumichila aŵaga jwangalumbana atiji muntima mwakwe kuti, ‘Ambuje ŵangu akukaŵa kuuja,’
ni kutanda kwaputa achikapolo achinjakwe ni kulya ni kung'wa pamo ni ŵakolelwa,
ambujegwe kapolo jula chachiika lyuŵa lyangakulilolela ni saa jangakujimanya.
Chachinjamuka wamba ni kummika mu mpingo umo ni ŵaulamba. Kweleko chikuŵe ni kulila ni kuchilimya meeno.
“Kele katema ko, Umwenye wa kwinani chiulandane ni achiŵali likumi ŵaŵajigele ibatali yao, ŵatyosile kwachingamila ambuje ŵa ulombela.
Nsano ŵao ŵaliji ŵakuloŵela ni nsano ŵaliji ŵakalamuka.
Ŵaŵaliji ŵakuloŵela ŵala ŵajigele ibatali yao, nambo nganajigala mauta ga akiba.
Nambo ŵele ŵaŵaliji ŵakalamuka ŵala ŵajigele mauta mu yupa pamo ni ibatali yao.
Pakuŵa ambuje ŵaulombela ŵakaŵile kwika, achiŵali ŵala wose ŵagwesele ni kugona.
Nambo sikati chilo nnope kwapali kunyokonya, ‘Nnole! Ambuje ŵaulombela akwika, njaule nkaachingamile.’
Pelepo achiŵali ŵala wose ŵajimwiche, ŵaiŵisile chile ibatali yao.
Ŵele ŵakuloŵela ŵala ŵaasalile ŵakalamuka kuti, ‘Mtupe mauta genu kanandi pakuŵa ibatali yetu ikusimika.’
Nambo ŵakalamuka ŵala ŵajanjile, ‘Ngagatukwana uwe ni ŵanyamwe! Mmbaya njaule kwa kusumisya nkalisumile mwachinsyene!’
Nipele, ŵele achiŵali ŵakuloŵela wo paŵajawile kusuma mauta, ambuje ŵaulombela ŵaiche, ni achiŵali ŵaŵaliŵisile chile ŵajinjile pamo nawo mu nyuumba ja ulombela ni nnango waugalikwe.
Kanyuma achiŵali ŵane ŵala ŵaiche, ŵaaŵilasile, ‘Achimwene, achimwene, ntuugulile!’
Nambo ŵelewo ŵajanjile, ‘Ngunsalila isyene, ngangummanyilila ŵanyamwe.’ ”
Nipele, Che Yesu ŵatite, “Nlilolechesye, pakuŵa ngankumanyilila lyuŵa atamuno saa pachaiche Mwana jwa Mundu.
“Pakuŵa Umwenye wa kwinani uli mpela mundu jwasachile kwaula ulendo, ŵaaŵilasile ŵakutumichila ŵao ni kwalechela chipanje chakwe.
Ŵampele kila jumo ichaikombole, jumo maunjili nsano ga mbiya, ni jwine maunjili gaŵili ni jwine liunjili limo, ni ŵajawile.
Nipele, juŵapochele mbiya maunjili nsano ŵajawile kukusumisya malonda ni ŵapatile mbiya sine maunjili nsano.
Ilaila juŵapochele mbiya maunjili gaŵili jula, ŵapatile sine maunjili gaŵili.
Nambo jwele juŵapochele mbiya liunjili limo jula, ŵajawile, ni kusola lisimbo paasi, ni ŵasisile mbiya ja achimwene jwao.
“Pagapite moŵa gamajinji, achimwene jwa ŵakutumichila ŵala ŵausile, ni ŵatandite kuŵalanjila mbiya sisyatumiche ni mbiya sisyapatikene mu mbiya syakwe.
Katumetume juŵapochele mbiya maunjili nsano ŵaiche ali ajigele gane nsano, ŵaasalile, ‘Achimwene, mwambele maunjili nsano ga mbiya, nnole, nyonjechesye maunjili gane nsano.’
Achimwene jwao ŵansalile jwelejo kuti, ‘Yambone, jwakutumichila jwambone ni jwakukulupilichika. Ndi jwakukulupilichika kwa indu yainandi pe, chinampe yejinji. Njise kukusengwa pamo ni achimwene jwenu.’
“Sooni jwakutumichila juŵapochele mbiya maunjili gaŵili ŵaiche, ŵatyosisye mbiya sine maunjili gaŵili gagajonjechekwe, ŵatite, ‘Achimwene, mwambele mbiya maunjili gaŵili. Nnole, mbatile sine maunjili gaŵili gagajonjechekwe.’
Achimwene jwao ŵansalile jwelejo kuti, ‘Yambone, jwakutumichila jwambone ni jwakukulupilichika. Ndi jwakukulupilichika kwa indu yainandi pe, chinampe yejinji. Njise kukusengwa pamo ni achimwene jwenu.’
“Nambo juŵapochele mbiya liunjili limo jula ŵaiche, ŵatite, ‘Achimwene, nguimanyilila kuti mwe ndi ŵakulimba, mmweji nkugungula pa nganimpande, ni kusonganganya panganimmisa.
Najogwepe, najisisile mbiya jenu paasi. Nipele njigale mbiya jenu.’
“Achimwene jwao ŵanjanjile, ‘Mwe ndi jwakutumichila jwangalumbana ni jwa ulesi! Nkuumanyilila kuti une ngugungula panganimbande, ni kusonganganya panganimisa.
Nipele yammajile kujiŵika mbiya jangu mu nyuumba ja kugosela mbiya, none pachiiche ngajijigele jajili jangu ni chakonjecheka chakwe!
Munsumule mbiya jo mumpe jwakwete mbiya maunjili likumi.
Pakuŵa, jwali ni chindu chapegwe ni konjechekwa. Nambo jwanganakola chindu, ata chele chakwete cho chichijigalikwe.
Yankati jwakutumichila jwangaikanacho chakonjecheka, mumponye paasa ku chipi! Kweleko chikuŵe ni kulila ni kuchilimya meeno.’ ”
“Katema kachaiche Mwana jwa Mundu mu ukulu wakwe ni achikatumetume ŵa kwinani wose ali pamo nawo, pelepo chachitama pa chitengu chao cha umwenye chachili ni ukulu.
Ŵandu ŵa ilambo yose chasongangane mmbujo mwao, nombe chachalekanganya ŵandu mpela ŵakuchinga yakuti pakusilekanganya ngondolo ni mbusi.
Chaachisiŵika ngondolo yaani ŵandu ŵambone kundyo kwakwe ni mbusi yaani ŵandu ŵangalumbana kunchiji kwakwe.
“Nombe Mwenye chiŵasalile ŵaali ŵa kundyo kwakwe kuti, ‘Njise ŵanyamwe ŵampegwile upile ni Atati ŵangu, mpochele umwenye ŵampanganyichisye chile chitandile kugumbikwa chilambo.
Pakuŵa jangwete sala ni ŵanyamwe mwambele chakulya ni jangwete njota ni ŵanyamwe mwambele meesi ni naliji jwannendo ni ŵanyamwe mwambochele mmajumba genu.
Naliji matakope, ŵanyamwe mwandakwisye ni naliji jwakulwala ŵanyamwe mwaaiche kukuunola ni naliji jwantawe ŵanyamwe mwanyimajimile.’
Pelepo, ŵandu ŵakupanganya yaili yambone paujo pa Akunnungu chiŵajanje mwenye kuti, ‘Ambuje, ana chakachi twambweni ŵa sala ni kumpa chakulya, pane jinkwete njota ni kung'wesya meesi?
Ana chakachi twammweni nli jwannendo ni kumpochela, pane matakope ni kuntakusya?
Chakachi twammweni ndi nkulwala pane jwantawe ni kwika kukunnola?’
Mwenye chiŵajanje, ‘Ngunsalila isyene, chachilichose chimwantendele jumo jwa ŵanyaŵa achalongo ŵangu achanandi, mwandendele une.’
“Nipele chiŵasalile ŵele ŵaali kunchiji kwao, ‘Ntyoche mmbujo mwangu ŵanyamwe ŵankwete malweso! Njaule ku mooto moŵa gose pangali mbesi wangasimika, wauŵichikwe chile kwa ligongo lya Shetani ni achikatumetume ŵakwe.
Pakuŵa jangwete sala nganimumba chakulya, jangwete njota nganimumba meesi.
Naliji jwannendo nganimumbochela mmajumba genu ni panaliji matakope nganimumba nguo ni nalwalaga ni nataŵikwe nganinnyika kukulola.’
“Pelepo nombe chajanje, ‘Ambuje, ana chakachi twammweni ndi jinkwete sala ni njota, ni ndi jwannendo pane matakope, ni ndi nkulwala pane jwantaŵikwe, nowe nganitunkamusya?’
Mwenye chajanje, ‘Ngunsalila isyene, kila pamwakanaga kumpanganichisya gelega jumo jwa ŵanyaŵa achanandi ŵa, mwakanile kuumbanganichisya une.’
Nipele, ŵanyaŵa chajaule kumasausyo moŵa gose pangali mbesi, nambo ŵandu ŵakupanganya yaili yambone paujo pa Akunnungu chajaule ku umi wa moŵa gose pangali mbesi.”
Che Yesu paŵamalisisye kuŵecheta gelego gose, ŵaasalile ŵakulijiganya ŵao,
“Nkumanyilila kuti pachigamale moŵa gaŵili chichiŵe chindimba cha Pasaka, ni Mwana jwa Mundu chakatyosyekwe kuti aŵambikwe pa nsalaba.”
Katema ko achakulu ŵa mbopesi ni achakulu ŵa ŵandu ŵasimene pa nsana wa nyuumba ja Jwankulu Jwambopesi jwaŵilanjikwe che Kayafa.
Ŵajilene ichajile pa kwakamula Che Yesu kwa malindi ni kwaulaga.
Nambo ŵatite chele chindu chinatyochele katema ka lyuŵa lya chindimba cha Pasaka, ngakaŵa chikutyochele kutindiganya pa ŵandu.
Che Yesu paŵaliji ku Besania, ku nyuumba ji che Simoni, juŵalamile matana.
Jwankongwe jumo juŵaliji ni chuupa chachikolochekwe ni liganga lya alabasta chachili ni mauta ga kununjila nnope ni ga ndalama jajikulungwa, ŵaichilile Che Yesu paŵatemi kulya chakulya, ŵajitile mauta muntwe.
Ŵakulijiganya ŵao paŵaiweni yele ŵatumbile, ŵatite, “Awu uwonasi u wa chichi?
Aga mauta ga ngati gakasumichikwe kwa mbiya jekulungwa, ni kupegwa ŵakulaga.”
Che Yesu ŵasimanyilile ng'anisyo syao, ŵaasalile, “Ligongo chi nkunsausya jwankongwe jo? Jwele atesile yambone kukwangu.”
Ŵakulaga alinji moŵa gose ni ŵanyamwe, nambo une nguuŵa ni ŵanyamwe moŵa gose.
Aju jwankongwe ju anyitilile pa chiilu mauta ga kununjila kuti amiche chile kwa masiko gangu.
Ngunsalila isyene, papali pose pa chilambo pano patachilalichila Ngani Jambone ji, achi chatesile jwankongwe ju chichisalichikwe kwa kunkumbuchila.
Nipele, che Yuda Isikaliote, jumo jwa likumi ni ŵaŵili ŵala, ŵajawile kwa achakulu ŵa mbopesi,
ŵausisye, “Ana chimuumbe ichichi nannyichisyaga Che Yesu kukwenu?” Ŵaŵalanjile ipande selasini ya feza.
Chitandile kele katema ko che Yuda ŵasosaga lipesa lya kwaichisya kukwao.
Lyuŵa limo likanaŵe lyuŵa lya chindimba cha mikate jangatagwa amila, ŵakulijiganya ŵajaulile Che Yesu ni kwausya, “Ana kwapi nkusaka tukankolochesye chakulya cha Pasaka?”
Ŵajanjile, “Njaule mmusi kwa mundu jumpepe, nkansalile, ‘Jwakwiganya akuti, katema kangu kaiche, chindye chakulya cha Pasaka kumangwenu pamo ni ŵakulijiganya ŵangu.’ ”
Ŵakulijiganya ŵala ŵatesile mpela iŵatite pakusalilwa ni Che Yesu, ŵakolosisye chakulya cha Pasaka.
Ligulo, Che Yesu ŵatemi pakulila chakulya pamo ni ŵakulijiganya ŵao kumi na mbili.
Paŵalyaga, Che Yesu ŵatite, “Ngunsalila isyene, jumo jwenu chakang'alauche.”
Ŵakulijiganya ŵasupwiche nnope, ŵatandite kuusya jumo jumo, “Ambuje! Uli, ndili une?”
Che Yesu ŵajanjile, “Juchakatoŵele nkate mumbale pampepe ni une jujojo ni juchakang'alauche.
Elo, Mwana jwa Mundu chawe mpela Malembelo ga Akunnungu igakuti pakusala, nambo ulaje kwa jwelejo juchakangalauche Mwana jwa Mundu! Ikaliji mmbaya ngakapagwe jwele mundu jo.”
Che Yuda, juŵangalawiche, ŵausisye, “Jwakwiganya! Ndili une?” Che Yesu ŵajanjile, “Ugwe mmechete.”
Paŵalyaga, Che Yesu ŵaujigele nkate, ŵatogolele Akunnungu, ŵaugaŵenye, ŵapele ŵakulijiganya ŵao achitiji, “Njigale ndye, achi ni chiilu changu.”
Nipele ŵachijigele chikombe cha divai, ŵatogolele, ŵapele achitiji, “Nng'welele achi ŵanawose,
pakuŵa aji ni miasi jangu ja lilangano jajikwitika kwa ligongo lya ŵajinji kwa kwalechelesya sambi.
Nambo ngunsalila kuti nguung'wa sooni divai ja sabibu mpaka paching'we jasambano pamo ni ŵanyamwe mu umwenye wa Atati ŵangu.”
Paŵamasile kwimba lujimbo lwa kulapa, ŵatyosile, ŵajawile kuchikwesya cha Miseituni.
Nipele Che Yesu ŵaasalile sooni, “Chilo cha lelo jino, ŵanyamwe ŵanawose chinchimwe ni une, pakuŵa Malembelo ga Akunnungu gakuti, ‘Chinampute jwakuchinga ni mpingo wa ngondolo chipwilingane.’
Nambo pachimale kusyuka, chinannongolele ku Galilaya.”
Che Petulo ŵaasalile Che Yesu, “Nachiŵamuno ŵanawose chachimwe ni mmwe ni kunneka, nambo une ngali pachinanneche.”
Che Yesu ŵansalile che Petulo, “Ngunsalila isyene, chilo chino jikanaŵe kutongola tambala, chimungane katatu.”
Che Petulo ŵatite, “Iŵaga chingawe pamo nomwe, ngasinankana.” Ŵakulijiganya ŵane ŵala ŵanawose ŵatite iyoyo.
Nipele Che Yesu ŵajawile pamo nawo kwiuto kwakukuŵilanjikwa ku Getesemane, ŵaasalile ŵakulijiganya ŵao kuti, “Ntame apano une ngwaula ako kukupopela.”
Ŵalongene nawo che Petulo pamo ni ŵanache ŵaŵili ŵa chilume ŵa che Sebedayo, ŵatandite kusupuka nnope ni kulagasika.
Pelepo ŵaasalile, “Ngusupuka nnope muntima mpaka chiŵandi kuwa. Ntame apano ni nchesye pamo ni une.”
Nipele, ŵajawile mmbujo kanandi, ŵagwile manguku, ŵapopele achitiji, “Atati ŵangu, iŵaga ikukomboleka, achi chikombe cha malagasyo chimbite, nambo ngaŵa kwa kusaka une, nambo iŵe mpela inkuti pakusaka mmwe.”
Ŵajaulile ŵakulijiganya ŵala, ŵasimene agonile, ŵaasalile che Petulo, “Ana uli, nganinkombola kuchesya pamo ni une atamuno saa jimope?
Nchesye ni kupopela kuti nkaika kwinjila nkulinjikwa. Mbumu jikusaka nambo chiilu changali machili.”
Che Yesu ŵajawile sooni kaaŵili kukupopela, “Atati ŵangu, iŵaga ngaikomboleka achi chikombe cha malagasyo chipite pangang'welela une, nipele, chinkusaka chitendekwe.”
Ŵajaulile sooni ŵakulijiganya ŵao, ŵasimene agonile, pakuŵa meeso gao gatopelwe ni lugono.
Nipele ŵalesile, ŵajawile sooni kukupopela kaatatu kwa maloŵe galagala.
Nipele ŵajaulile ŵakulijiganya ŵala, ŵaasalile, “Ana uli, chiŵela nli mu lugono ni kupumulila? Nnole katema kasyene kaiche, ni Mwana jwa Mundu chatajikwe mmakono mwa ŵandu ŵa sambi.
Njime, twende. Nnole! Akwika jwakuung'alauka.”
Nipele, Che Yesu paŵaliji nkuŵecheta nawo, ŵaiche che Yuda, jumo jwa ŵakulijiganya kumi na mbili ŵala. Pamo nawo ŵaiche ŵandu ŵajinji ali ajigele mapanga ni imbonga ŵaŵatumikwe ni achakulu ŵambopesi ni achakulu ŵa ŵandu.
Juŵasachile kungalauka Che Yesu jo, ŵapele chimanyisyo kuti, “Juchinankomasye kwa kwakunnonyela ni jujojo, munkamule.”
Che Yuda ŵammandichile Che Yesu, ŵaasalile, “Ngunkomasya jwakwiganya!” Nipele ŵankomasisye kwa kwakumbata.
Che Yesu ŵansalile, “Ambusanga, ntende chinnyichile.” Pelepo ŵaiche ŵandu ŵala, ŵankamwile Che Yesu ni kwaŵika paasi pa ulamusi wao.
Jumo jwa ŵaŵaliji pamo ni Che Yesu ŵalisolomwele lipanga lyakwe, ŵamputile kapolo jwa Jwankulu Jwambopesi, ŵankatile liwiwi.
Pelepo Che Yesu ŵansalile jwejo, “Mmusye upanga wenu mwigonelo mwakwe, pakuŵa jwalijose jwakuulaga ni lipanga, chaulajikwe ni lipanga.
Uli ana ngankwimanyilila kuti ngukombola kwaŵenda Atati ŵangu ni kuumbelechela kupunda ŵangondo mipingo kumi na mbili ŵa achikatumetume ŵa kwinani?
Nambo chigamalile chinauli Malembelo ga Akunnungu gagakuti ikuŵajilwa kuwa?”
Katema kakoko Che Yesu ŵausalile mpingo wa ŵandu uŵaiche kukwakamula, “Uli nnyiche kukungamula kwa mapanga ni imbonga mpela ndili mundu jwangangugakamulichisya malajisyo? Moŵa gose naliji pa Nyuumba ja Akunnungu njijiganyaga, nambo nganimungamula!
Nambo aga gose ga gatendekwe pakuti gamalile malembelo ga ŵakulondola ŵa Akunnungu.” Pelepo ŵakulijiganya ŵanawose ŵalesile, ŵatisile.
Nipele, ŵele ŵandu ŵaŵankamwile Che Yesu ŵanjawisye ku nyuumba ji che Kayafa juŵaliji Jwankulu Jwambopesi, kuŵasongangene ŵakwiganya Malajisyo ni achachekulu.
Che Petulo ŵankuiye kwa kutali mpaka mu lutenje lwa Jwambopesi Jwankulu, ŵajinjile nkati pamo ni ŵakulindilila kuti alole ichikatendekwe.
Nipele, achakulu ŵambopesi ni nkungulu wose ŵausosile umboni wa unami kuti akombole kumbulaga Che Yesu.
Nambo nganapata umboni wauli wose, nachiŵamuno ŵaiche ŵandu ŵajinji ŵa unami. Kumbesi kwakwe ŵaiche ŵandu ŵaŵili.
Ŵatite, “Aju mundu ju ŵatite, ‘Ngukombola kujigumula Nyuumba ja Akunnungu ni kujitaŵa sooni kwa moŵa gatatu.’ ”
Jwambopesi Jwankulu ŵajimi, ŵammusisye Che Yesu, “Ana ngankwanga liloŵe? Ana ŵandu ŵa akummechetela chichi?”
Nambo Che Yesu ŵatemi ji. Jwambopesi Jwankulu ŵansalile, “Ngunnumbisya kwa Akunnungu ŵaali ŵajumi, ntusalile naga isyene mmwe ni Kilisito, Mwana jwa Akunnungu!”
Che Yesu ŵanjanjile, “Mmwe mmechete! Nambo ngunsalila kuti, chitandile sambano chimumbone Mwana jwa Mundu ali atemi kundyo kwa Ambuje ŵa machili, chimumbone iyoyo achiikaga pa maunde ga kwinani.”
Pelepo, Jwambopesi Jwankulu ŵapapulenye nguo syao, ŵatite, “Ŵatukene Akunnungu! Uli tukuusaka sooni umboni nkati jweleju? Sambano mpilikene yatite pakwatukana Akunnungu.
Ŵanyamwe nkuti uli?” Ŵanyawo ŵanjanjile, “Aŵajilwe kuwa!”
Nipele ŵansunile mata ku meeso, ŵamputile. Ŵane ŵamputile majanda palijeje,
achitiji, “Nlondole, alakwe Kilisito Jwakuwombola, ŵaani ŵamputile!”
Che Petulo ŵatemi paasa mu lutenje. Nipele, jwakutumichila jumo jwankongwe ŵanjaulile, nikuti, “Alakwe mwaliji pampepe ni Che Yesu jwa ku Galilaya.”
Nambo che Petulo ŵakanile mmbujo mwa ŵanawose achitiji, “Ngangumanyilila inkuŵecheta yo.”
Paŵakopokaga paasa, katumetume jwine jwankongwe ŵammweni, ŵaasalile uŵaliji pelepo kuti, “Mundu ju ŵaliji pamo ni Che Yesu jwa ku Nasaleti.”
Che Petulo ŵakanile sooni kwa kulumbilila, “Ngangummanyilila mundu ju.”
Kanyuma kanandi, ŵandu ŵaŵaliji pelepo ŵajaulile che Petulo, ŵansalile, “Kusyene, mmwe nomwe nli jumo jwakwe, pakuŵa uŵechete wenu ukummanyisya.”
Pelepo che Petulo ŵatandite kulumbilila kwakulilwesya achitiji, “Ngangummanyilila mundu ju!” Katema kakoko tambala jatongwele.
Che Petulo ŵagakumbuchile maloŵe gaŵasalilwe ni Che Yesu kuti, “Chimungane katatu, jikanaŵe kutongola tambala.” Nipele, ŵatyosile paasa, ŵalisile nnope.
Pakwachele, achakulu ŵambopesi ni achakulu ŵa ŵandu ŵajilene ichajile pakwaulaga Che Yesu.
Ŵataŵile magwedegwede, ŵanjigele, ŵampeleche ku che Pilato, jwankulu jwa Chiloma.
Pelepo, che Yuda juŵangalawiche, paŵaiweni kuti Che Yesu amasile kulamulikwa, ŵalilasiche muntima, ŵausisye kwa achakulu ŵambopesi ni achakulu ŵa ŵandu ipande selasini ya feza.
Ŵaasalile, “Leŵile kwa kuntyosya mundu jwangali ni sambi aulajikwe.” Nambo ŵele ŵanyawo ŵatite, “Yeleyo ili yetuwe? Chimmanyilile mwasyene.”
Nombejo ŵaponyele feza sila pa Nyuumba ja Akunnungu, ŵakopweche paasa, ŵajawile kukulitaŵilila.
Achakulu ŵambopesi ŵasijigele feza sila, nikuti, “Ngalumbana kusiŵika kwa jwakugosa feza sya Nyuumba ja Akunnungu pakuŵa sili feza sisyapatikene kwa kuulaga.”
Nipele, ŵajilene, ŵasumile ngunda wa lilongo kuti paŵe pakwasichila achalendo.
Nipele, mpaka lelo jino wele ngunda wo ukuŵilanjikwa ngunda uwasumikwe kwa feza sisyapatikene kwa kuulaga.
Kwa yeleyo maloŵe gaŵaŵechete che Yelemia jwakulondola jwa Akunnungu gamalile gagakuti, “Ŵajigele ipande selasini ya feza, malinga ni malipilo gaŵajilene Ŵaisilaeli kulipa kwa ligongo lyao.
Feza syo ŵasumile ngunda wa lilongo, mpela iŵanajisye Ambuje.”
Che Yesu ŵajimi mmbujo mwa jwankulu jwa chilambo. Nipele, jwankulu jwa Chiloma ŵammusisye, “Ana mmwe ni Mwenye jwa Ŵayahudi?” Che Yesu ŵanjanjile, “Mmwe mmechete.”
Nambo achakulu ŵambopesi ni achachekulu paŵammechetelaga, nganajanga.
Nipele che Pilato ŵammusisye, “Ana ngankupilikana ganagose gele gakummechetela go?”
Nambo Che Yesu nganajanga namose liloŵe limo, jwankulu jwa Chiloma jo ŵasimosile nnope.
Yasyoŵeleche jwankulu jwa Chiloma kwagopolela Myahudi jumo jwataŵikwe juŵansachile katema ka chindimba cha Pasaka.
Kele katema ko paliji ni jwantawe juŵamanyiche nnope, liina lyakwe che Balaba.
Nipele, paŵasongangene ŵandu pamo, che Pilato ŵausisye, “Ana nkusaka nangopole jwapi mwa ŵele ŵaŵili, che Balaba pane Che Yesu jwakuŵilanjikwa Kilisito?”
Pakuŵa ŵaimanyilile kuti ŵantyosisye kwa ligongo lya wiu.
Che Pilato paŵatemi pa chitengu cha kulamulila, ŵankwawo ŵaichenawo utenga wanti, “Nkalipasyapasya kutenda chachili chose nkati jwele mundu jwambone jo, pakuŵa lelo lasile mu sagamisi kwa ligongo lyakwe.”
Nambo achakulu ŵambopesi ni achakulu ŵane ŵanyenjile ŵandu kuti ŵaŵende agopolwe che Balaba ni ŵaulaje Che Yesu.
Che Pilato ŵausisye ŵanyawo, “Nkunsaka jwapi nangopolele mwa ŵele ŵaŵili ŵa?” Ŵajanjile, “Che Balaba!”
Che Pilato ŵausisye ŵanyawo, “Sano, naatende chichi Che Yesu jwakuŵilanjikwa Kilisito?” Ŵanawose ŵatite, “Mwaŵambe pa nsalaba!”
Nambo che Pilato ŵausisye, “Ligongochi? Ungalumbana chi watesile?” Ŵanyawo ŵanyanyisye achitiji, “Mwaŵambe pa nsalaba!”
Nipele, che Pilato paŵaiweni kuti ngakukombola kupanganya chachili chose nambo kutindiganya kukutanda, ŵajigele meesi ni kunaŵa makono mmbujo pa ŵandu ni ŵatite, “Une ngangulipasyapasya nkati chiwa cha aju mundu ju, chinyimanyilile mwachinsyene.”
Ŵandu ŵanawose ŵatite, “Miasi jao jiŵe pachanya petu ni achiŵana ŵetu!”
Nipele che Pilato ŵagopolele che Balaba kutyochela mu nyuumba jakutaŵilwa, nambo paŵamasile kumputa Che Yesu ibokola ŵantyosisye kukwaŵamba pa nsalaba.
Nipele ŵangondo ŵa jwankulu jwa Chiloma ŵanjinjisye Che Yesu nkati likome, wansyungwile mpingo wose.
Ŵammusile nguo syao, ŵammwasisye mwinjilo wechejeu wa chimwenye.
Nipele ŵakolosiye chindu mpela singwa ja miiŵa, ŵammwasisye mu ntwe, sooni ŵammichile nnasi kundyo. Ŵatindiŵele mmbujo mwao ni kuntendela chanache achitiji, “Tukunkomasya Mwenye jwa Ŵayahudi!”
Ŵansunile mata, ŵaujigele nnasi ula ni kumputa mu ntwe.
Paŵamasile kuntendela chanache, ŵammusile mwinjilo ula ni kuntakusya nguo syao, nipele ŵampeleche kukwaŵamba pa nsalaba.
Paŵajaulaga, ŵansimene mundu jumo liina lyakwe che Simoni jwa musi wa ku Kulene, ŵankanganichisye kujigala nsalaba u Che Yesu.
Paŵaiche peuto papakuŵilanjikwa Goligota, malumbo gakwe, peuto pa Chikalakasa cha Ntwe,
ŵampele divai jewanganye chindu chakuŵaŵa kutyosya kupeteka. Nambo Che Yesu nkupasya pe ŵakanile kung'wa.
Ŵaŵambile pa nsalaba, nipele ŵagaŵene nguo syao kwakutendela gudugudu.
Ŵatemi pepala, ŵaliji nkwalindilila.
Pachanya ntwe wakwe pa nsalaba ŵaŵisile chibao cha maloŵe gagalembekwe, “Aŵa ni Che Yesu, Mwenye jwa Ŵayahudi.”
Paliji ni ŵachiswamba ŵaŵili ŵaŵambikwe pamo nawo, jumo kunchiji ni jwine kundyo.
Ŵandu ŵaŵapitaga pelepo ŵantukene achipukunyaga mitwe jao nikuti,
“Mmwe jumwatite kuti nkukombola kujigumula Nyuumba ja Akunnungu ni kujitaŵa kwa moŵa gatatu. Sambano nlikulupusye mwasyene. Iŵaga mmwe ndi Mwana jwa Akunnungu, ntuluche pa nsalaba po!”
Iyoyo peyo achakulu ŵambopesi pamo ni ŵakwiganya malajisyo ni achachekulu ŵantendele chanache achitiji,
“Ŵakulupwisye ŵane, nambo asyene ngakukombola kulikulupusya! Iŵaga ŵele ali Mwenye jwa Ŵaisilaeli! Sambano atuluche pa nsalaba po, noweji tutwakulupile.
Ŵaakulupilile Akunnungu ni kuŵecheta kuti ŵele ali Mwana jwa Akunnungu, nipele, iŵaga Akunnungu akunsaka ŵakulupusye sambano.”
Iyoyo peyo ŵeŵala uŵaŵambikwe pamo nawo pa nsalaba nombe ŵantukene.
Chitandile lyuŵa pantwe mpaka saa tisa, chilambo chose chaliji chipi.
Pajaiche saa tisa Che Yesu ŵalisile kwa liloŵe lyekulungwa, “Eloi, Eloi, lama sabakitani?” Malumbo gakwe, “Akunnungu ŵangu, Akunnungu ŵangu, kwachichi mulesile?”
Nambo ŵandu ŵane ŵaŵajimi pele paŵapilikene yele ŵatite, “Akwaŵilanga che Elia.”
Jumo jwao ŵautwiche, ŵajigele lidodoki ni kunyoya mu divai jakuipa, ŵajiŵisile mu nnasi, ŵapele ang'we.
Ŵane ŵatite, “Nnindilile tulole iŵaga che Elia chaiche kukwakulupusya.”
Nipele, Che Yesu ŵalisile sooni kwa liloŵe lyekulungwa, ŵajasiche.
Pelepo nguo ja lusasa ja Nyuumba ja Akunnungu japapwiche pambindikati, kutyochela mwinani mpaka paasi, chilambo chatinganyiche ni lwala syapalwiche.
Malembe gaunukwiche ni iilu ya ŵandu ŵajinji ŵa Akunnungu ŵaŵajasiche ŵasyuchikwe.
Nombewo ŵakopweche mmalembe, ni Che Yesu paŵamasile kusyuka, ŵajinjile mu mmusi wa Akunnungu, yaani Yelusalemu, ni ŵandu ŵajinji ŵaweni.
Nipele, jwankulu jwa ŵangondo ni ŵangondo ŵane ŵaŵaliji pamo nawo achinlindililaga Che Yesu paŵachiweni chilambo chininkutinganyika ni gagakopochele gala, ŵajogwepe nnope, ŵatite, “Isyene aju mundu ju ŵaliji Mwana jwa Akunnungu.”
Pelepo paliji ni achakongwe ŵajinji ŵaŵalolechesyaga kwakutali. Ŵanyawo ni ŵeŵala ŵaŵankuiye Che Yesu kutyochela ku Galilaya ni kwatumichila.
Mwa ŵele ŵanyawo ŵaliji che Maliamu jwa musi wa ku Magidala ni che Maliamu achikulugwe che Yakobo ni che Yusufu, pamo ni achikulu ŵa ŵanache ŵa che Sebedayo.
Pakwaswele, ŵaiche mundu jumo jwa chipanje jwa musi wa ku Alimataya liina lyao che Yusufu, nombejo jwaliji jwakulijiganya jwa Che Yesu.
Ŵajawile kwa che Pilato, ŵaŵendile apegwe chiilu chi Che Yesu. Che Pilato ŵalamwile kuti apegwe.
Che Yusufu ŵachijigele chiilu chila, ŵachiŵijilile nguo jeswela mbee jajili jasambano,
Che Yusufu ŵachiŵisile chiilu chi Che Yesu mu lilembe lyasambano liŵasepile palwala kwa ligongo lyakwe nsyene. Nipele, ŵaligalambulile liganga lyekulungwa pa nnango wa lilembe ni kutyoka.
Che Maliamu jwa musi wa ku Magidala ni che Maliamu ŵane ŵala ŵatemi aninkulolechesya ku lilembe.
Malaŵi jakwe, yaani lyuŵa lyakuliŵika chile kwa ligongo lya Lyuŵa lya Kupumulila, achakulu ŵambopesi ni Mafalisayo ŵajaulile che Pilato,
Ŵatite, “Achimwene, tukukumbuchila kuti jwakulambusya jula akanaŵe kuwa ŵatite, ‘Pakumala moŵa gatatu chisyuche.’
Kwayele tukummenda mwasalile ŵangondo ajaule akalilindilile lilembe kwa moŵa gatatu, kuti ŵakulijiganya ŵao anakombole kuchijigala chiilu chao ni kwasalila ŵandu kuti asyuchile. Akuno kulambusya kwa mbesi kuno chikuŵe kwawamba nnope kupunda kwaandanda kula.”
Che Pilato ŵaasalile, “Ayaga, nkwete ŵangondo, njaule nkalilindilile inkuti pakukombola.”
Nipele, ŵajawile, ŵalilindilile lilembe, ŵaŵisile chiugulilo peganga ni kwaleka ŵangondo kulindilila.
Palyamasile Lyuŵa lya Kupumulila, kuninkucha lyuŵa lyaandanda lya chijuma, che Maliamu jwa musi wa ku Magidala ni che Maliamu jwine ŵajawile kukulilola lilembe.
Chisisimuchile chakopochele chindendemesi chachikulungwa cha chilambo, katumetume jwa kwinani jwa Ambuje ŵatulwiche kutyochela kwinani, ŵaligalambwile liganga lila ni kutamila.
Uwoneche wakwe waliji mpela kumesya ni nguo syakwe syaliji syeswela mbee.
Ŵakulindilila lilembe lila ŵatetemele kwa lipamba nnope, ŵaliji mpela ŵawe.
Nambo katumetume jwa kwinani jula ŵaasalile achakongwe ŵala achitiji, “Ŵanyamwe nkajogopa! Ngumanyilila kuti nkunsosa Che Yesu juŵaŵambikwe pa nsalaba.
Nganapagwa pelepa pakuŵa ŵamale kusyuka mpela iŵasasile. Njise kunnole paŵagonile.
Nipele, njaule chitema nkaasalile ŵakulijiganya ŵao kuti asyuchile, nombewo akunnongolela ku Galilaya, kweleko chimwasimane. Ayaga, une jwammale kunsalila.”
Achiŵaga ni lipamba ni kusengwa kwakukulungwa, achakongwe wo ŵatyosile chitema ku lilembe, achiutukaga kukwasalila ŵakulijiganya ŵao.
Chisisimuchile, Che Yesu ŵasimene nawo, ŵatite “Ngunkomasya.” Achakongwe ŵala ŵajawile, ŵagakamwile makongolo gao ni kwapopelela.
Nipele Che Yesu ŵaasalile, “Nkajogopa! Njaule nkaasalile achalongo ŵangu ajaule ku Galilaya, kweleko ni kuchakamone une.”
Achakongwe ŵala pawajaulaga, ŵakulindilila ŵampepe ŵa lilembe ŵajawile mu mmusi kukwasalila achakulu ŵambopesi yanayose iyatendekwe.
Nipele, ŵasimene pamo ni achachekulu, ŵatemi nkungulu, pakumala kukunguluka ŵapele ŵakulindilila ŵala mbiya syasijinji,
ni kwasalila, “Ŵanyamwe chinjile yeleyi, ‘Ŵakulijiganya ŵao ŵaiche chilo, ŵachijiŵile chiilu uwe tuli tugonile.’
Iŵaga chaimanye yeleyi jwankulu jwa chilambo, uwe chitwanyenje, ni ŵanyamwe ngamma ni masausyo.”
Ŵakulindilila ŵala ŵasijigele mbiya sila, ŵatesile mpela iŵatite pakusalilwa. Jele ngani jo jajenele pasikati ja Ŵayahudi mpaka lelo jino.
Ŵakulijiganya kumi na moja ŵala ŵajawile ku Galilaya ku chitumbi kwaŵasalilwe ni Che Yesu ajaule.
Paŵamweni, ŵampopelele, nambo ŵampepe mwa ŵanyawo ŵaliji ni lipamba.
Nipele Che Yesu ŵaiche chiŵandi, ŵaasalile, “Mbegwile ukombole wose kwinani ni pachilambo.
Nipele njaule, nkaatende ŵandu ŵa ilambo yose aŵe ŵakulijiganya ŵangu, nchabatisyaga kwa liina lya Atati ni lya Mwana ni lya Mbumu jwa Akunnungu.
Nkaajiganye kugakamulichisya gose mpela ila indite pakunnajisya ŵanyamwe. None ndili pamo ni ŵanyamwe moŵa gose, elo, mpaka kumbesi kwa chilambo.”
Jeleji jili ndande ja Ngani Jambone ji Che Yesu Kilisito, Mwana jwa Akunnungu.
Mpela ijitite pakulembekwa mmalembo ga che Isaya juŵaliji jwakulondola jwa Akunnungu, “Akunnungu ŵatite, ‘Nguntuma jwantenga jwangu annongolele, jwejejo ni juchankolochesye litala lyenu.’
Mundu akunyanyisya mwipululu achitiji, ‘Mwakolochesye Ambuje litala lyao, ngolosye mwakusaka kupita.’ ”
Che Yohana Ŵakubatisya ŵatamaga mwipululu ni kwalalichila ŵandu aleche sambi ni kwabatisya kuti Akunnungu ŵalechelesye sambi syao.
Ŵandu achajinji kutyochela chilambo cha Ŵayahudi ni musi wa ku Yelusalemu wose ŵajawile kukwapikanila che Yohana, ŵajitichisye sambi syao nombejo ŵabatisye mu lusulo lwa Yolodani.
